Question: dayta frym main mtadd kalmwn kay mabyn artbata mytrks ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main mtadd kalmwn kay mabyn artbata mytrks ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap kwr () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: dlchspy kay kalmwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ dayta fym par kwr () kay tarykha kar ko kal kryn۔ astwr kay ntyjay main artbata mytrks ko ayk niay mtghyr myn۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: paiytwnympwrt pandaas kay tawr par PD# kuch dayta daata kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn ={'nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly' ، 'daywda' ، 'aymly'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ، 35 ، 40 ، 45] ، 'tnkhwaha': [50000 ،60000 ، 70000 ، 80000 ، 90000] ، 'tjrbha': [2 ، 4 ، 6 ، 8 ، 10]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'amr' ، 'tnkhwaha' ، aur 'kay mabyn artbata mytrks ka hasab lghaiyn۔tjrbha 'kalm askwr_mytrks = day ayf [[' amr '،' tnkhwaha '،' tjrbha ']]]۔ kwr ()# dasplay prnt (cor_matrix) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad 'amr' ، 'tnkhwaha' ، aur 'tjrbha' kalmwn kay mabyn artbata mytrks ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwr () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main artbata mytrks ko mtghyr corre_matrix main astwr krta haay۔as kay ntyjay main artbata mytrks main 3 ktaaryn aur 3 kalm hain jn main artbata kay ghtank hayn۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: amr ki tnkhwaha ka tjrbha 1.000000 0.981981 0.997179 sylry 0.981981 1.000000 0.9797979515150971797979797950 0.97979795 1.00000000 nwt ko astamal karnay kay tarykha kar (js main aap ko kntyshn kay astamal sy mtalk tarykha kar ka astamal kya jaskta haay۔aap hasab ktab ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye tarykha kar kay mkhtlf dlail bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay artbata ka tarykha aur mtalwbha mshahadat ki kam sy kam tadad۔aap artbata mytrks ko dykhnay kay l various mkhtlf laibryrywn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay smndry bwrn laibryry sy hayt myp () fnkshn۔

Question: kesi dusray kalm ki haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym main nya kalm bnanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main kesi aur kalm ki haalt par mbny dayta frym main ayk nya kalm bnanay kay bohat sy tarykay hayn۔yhaan tyn aam tarykay hayn: tarykha 1: lymbdaa fnkshnpythwnympwrt pandawn kay sath drkhwast () ka astamal karty hoey PD# kuch daytadaata = {'nam' kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly' ، 'daywda' ، 'daywda' ،'aymly'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ، 35 ، 40 ، 45]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'amr' kalm day ayf ['ayj_ghrwp' par mbny 'amr_ ghrwp' kay nam sy ayk nya kalm bnaiyn]= DF ['amr']۔ lghaiyn (lymbdaa X: 'jwan' agar x <30 aur 'prana')# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'amr' kalm par mbny 'ayj_ ghrwp' kay nam sy ayk nya kalm bnanay kay liye lymbdaa fnkshn kay sath laghw () tarykha astamal krta haay۔lymbdaa fnkshn chyk krta hay keh kya amr 30 sy kam hay aur agar yeh hay tou 'yngh' ki kymt ko 'yngh' tfwyzu krta hay agar yeh hay tou ، bsawrt dyghr is ki kymt 'prany' tfwyzu krty haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: nam amr_ghrwp 0 ayls 25 yngh 1 bab 30 awlda 2 charly 35 awlda 3 daywda 40 awlda 4 aymly 45 awlda mythwda 2: numpy.where () Pdimport numpy kay tawr par Pdimport numpy kay tawr par Pdimport numppe ka astamal karty hoey kuch dayta dayta = {kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔'nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly' ، 'daywda' ، 'aymly'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ، 35 ، 40 ، 45]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'ayj' kalm day ayf ['ayj_ghrwp'] = np.where par mbny 'ayj_ ghrwp' kay nam sy ayk nya kalm bnaiyn۔yha kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'amr' kalm par mbny 'ayj_ghrwp' kay nam sy ayk nya kalm bnanay kay liye numpy.where () fnkshn ka astamal krta haay۔fnkshn chyk krta hay keh kya amr 30 sy kam hay aur agar yeh hay tou 'yngh' ki kymt ko niay kalm main tfwyzu krta hay ، wrnha yeh 'prany' ki kymt tfwyzu krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: nam amr ki amr_ghrwp 0 ayls 25 yngh 1 bab 30 awlda 2 charly 35 awlda 3 awda 3 daywda 40 awlda 4 awlda 45 awlda mythwda 3: ayl aw sy [] ko ayk bwday kndayshnpythwnympwrt pandaas kay sath py day kay tawr par astamal krna# dayta dayta kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn = {'nam': [' ayls '،' bab '،' charly '،' daywda '،' aymly '] ،' amr ': [25 ، 30 ، 35 ، 40 ، 45]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# tkhlyk kryn'amr' kalmdaf.lwk [DF ['Age'] <30 ، 'ayj_ghrwp'] = 'yngh' dayf.lwk [df ['amr']> = 30 ، 'ayj_ ghrwp'] =' prana '# dasplay prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad 'amr' kalm par mbny 'ayj_ghrwp' kay nam sy ayk nya kalm bnanay kay liye bwlyn ki haalt kay sath LOC [] tarykha astamal krta haay۔yha tarykha chyk krta hay keh kya amr 30 sy kam hay aur niay kalm ko 'yngh' ki kymt tfwyzu krty hay agar yeh hay tou ، bsawrt dyghr is ki kymt 'prany' tfwyzu krty haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: nam amr ki amr_ghrwp 0 ayls 25 yngh 1 bab 30 awlda 2 charly 35 awlda 3 daywda 40 awlda 4 aymly 45 awlda nwt keh aap un tarykwn ko pandawn main un tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey ayk nya kalm bnanay kay liye kesi bhi haalt aur kesi dayta frym kay kesi bhi kalm ko astamal krsktay hayn۔aap tkhlyk ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye un tarykwn kay mkhtlf dlail aur tarykwn ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay tkhlyk ka mhawr aur tfwyzu karnay ki kdr۔

Question: do dayta frymwn ko amwdy tawr par jwranay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main amwdy tawr par do dayta frymwn ko jwranay kay l you ، aap mhawr pyramytr kay sath kwnkyt () fnkshn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ yahan akdamat hayn: do dayta fyms bnaiyn۔ kwkyt () ko dayta frymwn par kam karain aur inhain ayk fharst kay tawr par pas kryn۔ syt kryn۔ syt kryn۔mhawr pyramytr ko dayta fymwn ko amwdy tawr par aktha karnay kay liye 0 pr۔.45]} df2 = pd.dataframe (dayta 2)# do dayta fymwn ko amwmy tawr par dayf_kwnkyt = pd.concat ([df1 ، df2] ، mhawr = 0)# ntyjha prnt (df_concat) dasplay karain aur yeh kwda un ko lytyshrywn sy do dayta fym bnata hay aur un ko tfwyzu krta haay۔mtghyr DF1 aur DF2۔as kay bad yeh dono dayta frymwn ko fharst kay tawr par pas krkay aur mhawr pyramytr ko 0 par trtyb dy kar amwdy tawr par knkyt () fnkshn ka astamal krta haay۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: nam ki amr 0 ayls 251 bab 302 charly 350 daywda 401 aymly 45 nwt keh aap pandawn main kwnkyt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey amwdy tawr par amwdy tawr par shaml karnay kay liye kesi bhi tarah kay dayta fymwn ko astamal krsktay hayn۔aap is fnkshn kay mkhtlf dlail astamal krsktay hain ، jesay shmwlyt ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnaiyn ، jesay jwain ka tarykha aur daplykyt andayks ko snbhalna۔

Question: dawr kay kalm ko dayta frym main lwir kys main tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main tarwn kay kalm ko chhwtay kay kalm main tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap str.lower () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: astrnghza kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalm par str.lower () kay tarykha kar ko apni strngh ki akdar ko lwir kys main tbdyl karnay kay liay۔py day# kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt pandaas astrnghs dayta = {'nam' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly' ، 'daywda' ، 'aymly'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ،35 ، 40 ، 45]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'nam' kalm ko kam sy kam karain ['nam'] = df ['name']. str.lower ()# ntaij ka nshan (df) dasplay krynkwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'nam' kalm ko lwir kys main tbdyl karnay kay liye str.lower () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur isi mtghyr DF main tbdyl shuda kalm kay sath ntyjay main dayta frym ko astwr krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main tbdyl shuda kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: nam AGE0 ayls 251 bab 302 charly 353 daywda 404 aymly 45 nwt keh aap kesi dayta frym kay kesi bhi kalm ka astamal krsktay hain js main pandawn main str.lower () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey lwir kys main tbdyl karnay kay liye tar shaml hawta haay۔aap astrnghza main trmym karnay kay liye ays ty aar ayksysr kay mkhtlf strngh tarykwn ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay str.uper () hr lfza kay pehlay khta ko faidha phanchanay kay liye braay aur str.title () main tbdyl karnay kay liay۔

Question: dayta frym main do kalmwn kay mabyn ywklydayn fasalay ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main do kalmwn kay mabyn ywklydayn fasalay ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap numpy.linalg.norm () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: dlchspy kay kalmwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ numpy.linlg.norm () fnkshn ko do kalmwn kay darmiyan ywklydayn fasalay ka hasab lghanay kay liay۔pdimport numpy as np# kuch daytadaata = {'x' kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] ، 'y': [2 ، 4 ، 6 ، 8 ، 10]} df = pd.dataframe(dayta)# 'x' aur 'y' kalm dastns = np.linalg.norm (df ['x'] - df ['y']) kay darmiyan ywklydayn fasalay ka hasab lghaiyn۔ksy lght sy dayta frym aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh numpy.linalg.norm () fnkshn ka astamal krta hay takha 'x' aur 'Y' kalmwn kay mabyn ayk kalm ko dusray sy ayk kalm ko ghhta kar aur ntyjay main hony wali saf ka mamwl la kar ayk kalm kay darmiyan ywklydayn fasalay ka hasab lghaya jaskay۔ntyjay main fasalha mtghyr fasalay main mhafwza haay۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: 11.18033988749894949 nwt karain keh aap pandawn main numpy.linalg.norm () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey Euclidean fasalay ka hasab lghanay kay liye dayta frym kay kesi bhi do kalm astamal krsktay hayn۔aap hasab ktab ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye fnkshn kay mkhtlf dlail astamal krsktay hain ، jesay hasab ktab ka mhawr۔

Question: strngh kalm ki lmbaiy ki bnyad par dayta frym main ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main strngh kalm ki lmbaiy ki bnyad par dayta frym main ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay l you ، aap str.len () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: hr tar ki lmbaiy haasal karnay kay liye kalm par astrnghza kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ayk niay mtghyr main fltrda dayta frym kay ntyjay myn۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: py day kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt pandaas PD# astrnghs dayta = {'nam' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly' ، 'daywda' ، 'aymly'] ،' amr ': [25 ، 30 ، 35 ، 40 ، 45]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)#' nam 'kalm day ayf_fyltrda = day ayf [day ayf [day ayf [' nam 'ky lmbaiy ki bnyad par dayta frym ko fltr kryn].str.len () == 5]# rzalt prnt (DF_Filtered) dasplay karain yeh kwda lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'nam' kalm main hr tar ki lmbaiy haasal karnay kay liye str.len () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur is haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym ko fltr krta hay keh lmbaiy 5 kay brabr haay۔ ntyjay main fltr shuda dayta frym main 2 ktaar aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: nam AGE0 ayls 251 bab 30 nwt keh aap kesi dayta frym kay kesi bhi kalm ka astamal krsktay hain js main pandawn main str.len () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey tar ki lmbaiy ki bnyad par ktaar ko fltr karnay kay liye tar mwjwd haay۔aap astrnghza main trmym karnay kay liye ays ty aar ayksysr kay mkhtlf dyghr strngh tarykwn ka bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay str.contains () ko ayk astrngh aur str.replace () ki bnyad par fltr karnay kay liay۔

Question: dayta frym main kalm ki mjmway zayada sy zayada ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main kalm ki zayada sy zayada ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap kmks () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: dlchspy kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalm par kmaks () kay tarykha kar ko shaml kryn۔wylyw daata = {'wylyw' kay kalm kay sath dayta frym: [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'wylyw' kalmkwmwlytw_myks = df ['value'] kay mjmway zayada sy zayada ka hasab lghaiyn۔.kwmyks ()# rzalt prnt (mjmway_myks) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad 'wylyw' kalm ki zayada sy zayada ka hasab lghanay kay liye kmks () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur mtghyr mjmway_myks main ntyjay main mjmway tawr par zayada sy zayada zakhyrha krta haay۔ntyjay main mjmway zayada sy zayada ayk slslha hay js ki lmbaiy kalm ki tarah haay۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: 0 101 202 203 254 25 nam: wylyw ، day taip: ant 64 nwt keh aap pandawn main kmaks () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey mjmway tawr par zayada sy zayada ka hasab lghanay kay liye kesi dayta frym kay kesi bhi kalm ko astamal krsktay hayn۔aap kam kam sy kam aur kmprda () ka hasab lghanay kay liye kam kam sy kam aur kmprda () ka hasab lghanay kay liye kam kam sy kam aur kmprda () ka hasab ktab karnay kay liye bhi mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: dayta frym ko ayksl fail main tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: dayta frym ko ayksl fail main pandawn ka astamal karty hoey tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap TO_EXCEL () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat yeh hayn: dayta frym par ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔kchh daytadaata kay sath ayk dayta frym = {'nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly' ، 'daywda' ، 'aymly'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ، 35 ، 40 ، 45]} day ayf= pd.dataframe (dayta)# dayta frym ko ayksl ko ayksl main tbdyl kryn۔kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh ayk dlyl kay tawr par fail kay nam 'aaؤt pt. ayks ayl ays ayks' ko pas krkay dayta frym ko ayksl fail main tbdyl karnay kay liye tw_ssl () ka tarykha astamal krta haay۔andayks = ghalat dlyl yeh btaty hay keh andayks ko aaؤt pt main shaml nahin kya jana chahaiay۔mwjwdha wrkngh daairktry main ntyjay main ayksl fail ko mhafwza kya jaye gha۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: dayta frym kamyaby kay sath 'aaؤt pt. xlsx' ayksl fail ko braamd kya jata haay۔ nwt karain keh aap kesi bhi dayta frym ko pandawn main TO_EXCEL () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayksl fail main tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔aap tbadlwn ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye tarykha kar kay mkhtlf dyghr dlail bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay shyt ka nam aur aaؤt pt ki farmytngh۔aap ayksl failwn ko prahnay aur lkhnay kay liye mkhtlf dyghr laibryrywn aur afaal ka bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay awpn pِks ayl laibryry aur XLRD laibryry۔

Question: aam kalm ki bnyad par do dayta frymwn ko zum krnay/an main shaml hony kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main ayk aam kalm ki bnyad par do dayta frymwn ko zum/shaml karnay kay l you ، aap anzumam () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: ayk aam kalm kay sath do dayta frym bnaiyn۔ dayta frymwn par anzumam () fnkshn ko kal karain aur aam kalm nam ko pyramytr kay tawr par mntkl kryn۔aaؤt pt۔ astwr kay ntyjay main ayk niay mtghyr main mil gaya dayta frym۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: PD# AS PD# kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt pandaas ayk aam kalm dayta 1 = {'nam' kay sath do dayta fym bnaiyn: ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly'] ، 'amr ': [25 ، 30 ، 35]} df1 = pd.dataframe (dayta 1) dayta 2 = {' nam ': [' charly '،' daywda '،' aymly '] ،' tnkhwaha ': [50000 ، 60000 ، 70000 ، 70000]} df2 = pd.dataframe (dayta 2)# 'nam' kalm day ayf_mjda = pd.merge (DF1 ، DF1 ، DF2 ، on = 'name') par mbny do dayta frymwn ko zum kryn# rzalt prnt (df_mered) dasplay karain is kwda sy do dayta fymza tkhlyk karty hayn۔lght aur mtghyr DF1 aur DF2 ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh kalm kay nam ko pyramytr kay tawr par pas krkay 'nam' kalm ki bnyad par do dayta frymwn ko zum karnay kay liye anzumam () fnkshn ka astamal krta haay۔ntyjay main zum shuda dayta frym main aam kalm kay sath 2 ktaaryn aur 3 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: nam amr tnkhwaha 0 charly 35 500001 daywda 40 600002 aymly 45 7000000 nwt keh aap pandawn main anzumam () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey zum/shaml karnay kay liye mshtrkha kalm kay sath kesi bhi do dayta frymwn ko astamal krsktay hayn۔aap anzumam ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay l the fnkshn kay mkhtlf dyghr dlail bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay aaؤt pt main shaml karnay kay liye jwain ki ksm aur kalm۔aap dayta frymwn ko zum krnay/shaml karnay kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn ka bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay jwain () tarykha kar aur kwnkyt () fnkshn ۔1 astyk awwr flw 2 tywtwryals pwaint 3 shanyln 4 daatakp 5 jy ay ay ayksfwrjyks

Question: kesi haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym sy ktaarwn ko chhwranay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ki haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym sy ktaaryn chhwranay kay l you ، aap darap () tarykha ya bwlyn andayksngh astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan do aam tarykay hayn: tarykha 1: PD kay tawr par darap () paiytwnympwrt pandawn ka astamal karty hoey kuch dayta daata = {'nam' kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly' ، 'daywda' ، 'aymly'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ، 35 ، 40 ، 45]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# darap ktaar jahan amr 30df = df.drop (df [df ['amr'] <say kam haay30] .index)# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh ktaarwn ko mntkhb karnay kay liye bwlyn andayksngh ka astamal krta hay jahan amr 30 sy kam hay aur un ktaarwn ko dayta frym sy chhwranay kay liye darap () ka tarykha۔ntyjay main dayta frym main 3 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: nam amr 2 charly 353 daywda 404 aymly 45 mythwda 2: bwlyn andayksnghpythwnympwrt pandawn ka astamal PD# kuch daytadaata kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn = {'nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly' ،'daywda' ، 'aymly'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ، 35 ، 40 ، 45]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym ko fltr karain aur isy ayk niay mtghyrat ko tfwyzu karain = df[DF ['AGE']> = 30]# is kwda ko dasplay prnt (DF_FILTERED) dasplay karain is kwda sy lght sy dayta frym tyar hawta hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh ktaarwn ko mntkhb karnay kay liye bwlyn andayksngh ka astamal krta hay jahan amr 30 sy zayada ya is kay brabr hay aur is kay ntyjay main fltr shuda dayta frym ko ayk niay mtghyr DF_Filtered main tfwyzu krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main 3 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: nam AGE1 bab 302 charly 353 daywda 404 aymly 45 nwt keh aap un tarykwn ko pandawn main astamal krkay ktaarwn ko chhwranay kay liye kesi bhi haalt aur kesi dayta frym kay kesi bhi kalm ko astamal krsktay hayn۔aap un tarykwn kay mkhtlf dlail aur tarykay bhi astamal krsktay hain takha darap ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnaiyn ، jesay ghrnay ka mhawr aur ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalna۔

Question: dayta frym main kalm sy anwkhy akdar nkalnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main dayta frym main kalm sy anwkhy akdar nkalnay kay bohat sary tarykay hayn۔yhaan kuch aam tarykay hayn: tarykha 1: mnfrd () paiytwnympwrt pandawn ko btawr PD astamal krna# kuch daytadaata = {'nam' kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly' ، 'daywda' ، 'aymly'.lght aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'nam' kalm ki anwkhy akdar haasal karnay kay liye anwkha () tarykha astamal krta hay aur mtghyr mnfrd_aywls main mnfrd akdar ki ntyjay main hony wali saf ko astwr krta haay۔ntyjay main srny main 5 anwkhy akdar hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: ['ayls' 'bab' 'charly' 'daywda' 'aymly'] tarykha 2: darap_dawplykyts () paiytwnympwrt pandawn ka astamal karty hoey PD# kuch dayta daata = {'nam' kay sath dayta frym bnaiyn: ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly' ، 'daywda' ، 'aymly' ، 'ayls' ، 'ayls']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'nam' kalmwnyk_alys = day ayf ['nam' ki anwkhy akdar haasal kryn۔.as kay bad yeh 'nam' kalm ki nkl akdar ko chhwranay kay liye darap_daplykyts () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main mtghyr mnfrd_aywls main ntyjha khyza mnfrd akdar ko astwr krta haay۔ntyjay main syryza main 5 anwkhy akdar hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: 0 ayls 1 bab 2 charly 3 daywda 4 aymly nam: nam ، day taip: aabjykt nwt keh aap un tarykwn ko pandawn main un tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey anwkhy akdar nkalnay kay liye kesi dayta frym kay kesi bhi kalm ko astamal krsktay hayn۔aap aadad wa shmar main hayra phyry aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay wylyw_kwnt () hr anwkhy kdr ki tadd ko ghnnay kay l and aur nwnk () ko ghnnay kay liye anfrady akdar ki tadad ko ghnnay kay liay۔

Question: mtadd kalmwn sy akdar ko ykja krkay dayta frym main nya kalm bnanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main mtadd kalmwn sy akdar ko ykja krkay dayta frym main ayk nya kalm bnanay kay l you ، aap mkhtlf tarykwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch aam tarykay hayn: tarykha 1: + aaprytrpythwnympwrt pandaas ko btawr PD astamal krna# kuch dayta dayta kay sath dayta frym bnaiyn = {'phala nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly'] ، 'aakhry nam': [['asmth' ، 'jansn' ، 'braؤn']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'phala nam' aur 'aakhry nam' kalm ays day ayf ['mkml nam'] = DF ['phalay ayk nya kalm bnaiyn۔nam '] +' ' + DF [' aakhry nam ']# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'phala nam' aur 'aakhry nam' kalmwn ko darmiyan main jghha kay sath jwranay kay liye + aaprytr ka astamal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main syryza ko 'mkml nam' kay nam sy ayk niay kalm main tfwyzu krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 3 ktaaryn aur 3 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: pehla nam aakhry nam 0 nam 0 ayls asmth ayls asmth 1 bab jansn 2 charly braؤn charly braؤn mythwda 2: lymbdaa fnkshnpythwnympwrt pandaas kay sath atalak () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey PD# kuch dayta daata = {kay sath dayta frym bnaiyn۔'phala nam': ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly'] ، 'aakhry nam': ['asmth' ، 'jansn' ، 'braؤn']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# ayk nya bnaiynkalm 'phala nam' aur 'aakhry nam' kalm ays day ayf ['mkml nam']] = df.apply (lymbdaa ktaar: ktaar ['phala nam'] + '' + ktaar ['aakhry nam'] par lymbdaa fnkshn ka atalak krkay kalm، mhawr = 1)# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'phala nam' aur 'aakhry nam' kalmwn ko hr saf kay darmiyan jghha kay sath lymbdaa fnkshn kay sath laghw () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main syryza ko 'mkml nam' kay nam sy ayk niay kalm main tfwyzu krta haay۔mhawr = 1 dlyl sy yeh wazuha hawta hay keh lymbdaa fnkshn ko hr saf par laghw kya jana chahaiay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 3 ktaaryn aur 3 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: pehla nam aakhry nam mkml nam 0 ayls asmth ayls asmth 1 bab jansn bab jansn 2 charly braؤn charly braؤn nwt jo aap pandawn main un tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey akdar ko ykja karnay kay liye dayta frym kay kesi bhi kalm astamal krsktay hayn۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ko bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay astrnghs aur str.split () ko tksym karnay kay liye str.cat ()

Question: dayta frym main do dayt taim kalmwn kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main do dayt taim kalmwn kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap dayt taim madaywl ya taim daylta fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: do dayt taim kalmwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ taim daylta aabjykt haasal karnay kay liye ayk kalm ko dusray sy sbstryt kryn۔ taim daylta aabjykt ko mtalwbha taim ywnt ya farmyt main tbdyl kryn۔ ayk niay kalm main ntyjay main hony waly frk ko astwr kryn۔py day# kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt pandaas do dayt taim kalm ays day aay ty aay kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn = {'astart taim': ['2022-06-01 10:00:00' ، '2022-06-02 11:00:00' ، '2022-06-03 12:00:00 '] ،' akhttamy wkt ': [' 2022-06-01 11:00:00 '،' 2022-06-02 12:00:00 '،' 2022-06-03 13:00:00 ']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)#' astart taim 'awr' akhttamy wkt 'kalm ays day ayf [' dwranyha '] = pd.to_datetime (df [' end wkt ']) kay darmiyan frk ka hasab lghaiyn۔.to_datetime (df ['shrwa ka wkt'])# 'dwranyha' kalm ko mnt day ayf main tbdyl karain ['dwranyay (mnt)'] = df ['dwranyha'] / pd.timedelta (mnt = 1)# ntaij ka nshan (DF dasplay kryn) yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad 'astart taim' aur 'akhttamy wkt' kalmwn ko dayt taim aabjykt main tbdyl karnay kay liye PD.TO_DATYTIME () fnkshn ka astamal krta hay aur taim daylta aabjykt haasal karnay kay liye 'akhttamy wkt' kalm sy 'astart taim' kalm ko ghhta dyta haay۔ntyjay main taim daylta aabjykt ayk niay kalm main mhafwza hay jsay 'dwranyay' kehty hayn۔as kay bad kwda ko 'mdt' kalm ko mnt main 1 mnt kay taim daylta aabjykt kay zaryaha tksym krkay tbdyl krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main akdar ko 'dwranyay (mnt)' kay nam sy ayk niay kalm main astwr krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main 3 ktaaryn aur 4 kalm hain jn main niay kalm hayn۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: shrwa wkt kay akhttam ki mdt ki mdt (mnt) 0 2022-06-01 10:00:00 2022-06-01 11:00:00 01:00:00 60.01 2022-06-02 11.PD.TO_DATETIME () fnkshn aur pandawn main taim daylta aabjykt ka astamal karty hoey frk ka hasab lghanay kay liye dayta frym kay kesi bhi do dayta taim kalmwn ka astamal kryn۔aap dayta ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klaswn kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay day ty daay taim daylta aabjykt main dn ki tadad haasal karnay kay l. aur syknda ki kal tadad haasal karnay kay layk taim daylta aabjykt main ۔1 astytstksghlwby 2 astyk awwr flw 3 astytwlwjy 4 jy ay ay ay aysfwr jy ay ay ay ayks 5 try ayntwn 3983

Question: kam myks askylngh ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main addy kalm ko mamwl par lanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn main kam sy kam myks askylngh ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main addy kalm ko mamwl par lanay kay l you ، aap Mlxtend.preprocessing madaywl sy asklrn۔ pryprwsysngh madaywl ya Minmax_scaling () fnkshn sy Minmaxcaler () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat yeh hayn: tarykha 1: mn myks askylr () paiytwnympwrt pandawn ka astamal PDFROMOMSTIMEM IMPARPROSESSING IMPARPROSESSING IMPARMAXCALER# kuch daytadaata = {'kdr' kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50]} DF = PD۔dayta frym (dayta)# ayk mnymaks askylr aabjykt askylr = MINMAXSCALER bnaiyn ()# askylrdaf ['wylyw (narml)']] = askylr.ft_transfarm (day ayf [['wylyw']])# dasplay krynrzalt prnt (day ayf) yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh ayk mn myks askylr aabjykt bnata hay aur kalm ko 2D srny kay tawr par pas krkay askylr ka astamal karty hoey 'wylyw' kalm ko ft krta hay aur tbdyl krta haay۔ntyjay main mamwl ki akdar ko ayk niay kalm main mhafwza kya jata hay jsay 'wylyw (narmlaizada)' kehty hayn۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: wylyw wylyw (mamwl pr) 0 10 0.01 20 0.252 30 0.53 40 0.754 50 1.0method 2: minmax_scaling () paiytwnympwrt pandaas ko Pdfrom mlxtend kay tawr par astamal krna۔kdr ': [10 ، 20 ، 30 ، 40 ، 50]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# minmax_scaling () fnkshn day ayf ka astamal karty hawiay' wylyw 'kalm ko mamwl bnaiyn [' wylyw (aam) '] = Minmax_scaling (DF ['wylyw '] ، kalm = [0])# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh kalm aur kalm kay asharyha ko dlail kay tawr par pas krkay 'wylyw' kalm ko mamwl par lanay kay liye mlxtend.preprocessing madaywl sy minmax_scaling () fnkshn astamal krta haay۔ntyjay main mamwl ki akdar ko ayk niay kalm main mhafwza kya jata hay jsay 'wylyw (narmlaizada)' kehty hayn۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: wylyw wylyw (mamwl pr) 0 10 0.01 20 0.252 30 0.53 40 0.754 50 1.0 nwt keh aap un tarykwn ko pandawn main astamal krkay mamwl par lanay kay liye kesi dayta frym kay kesi bhi addy kalm ko astamal krsktay hayn۔aap aadad wa shmar kay hayra phyry aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klaswn kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay aadad wa shmar ko mayary bnanay aur () byan karnay kay liye astyndardasklr () jesay aadad wa shmar kay khlasaay kay aadadwshmar haasal karnay kay liay۔

Question: dayta frym main kalm ki kfayt shaary awsta awsta ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey kesi dayta frym main kalm ki awsta awsta awsta ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap EWM () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: dlchspy kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalm par EWM () kay tarykha kar ko kalm par chlaiyn۔wylyw dayta = {'wylyw' kay kalm kay sath dayta frym bnaiyn: [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'wylyw' kalmma = DF ki kfayt shaary awsta awsta ka hasab lghaiyn ['wylyw ']as kay bad yeh 'wylyw' kalm ki kfayt shaary awsta ka hasab lghanay kay liye EWM () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur mtghyr EMA main ntyjay main hony wali kfayt shaary awsta awsta ko astwr krta haay۔aspyn pyramytr hasab main shaml karnay kay liye adwar ki tadad ki wzuahat krta haay۔ntyjay main mchanay wali awsta awsta ayk slslha hay js ki lmbaiy kalm ki tarah haay۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: 0 10.0000001 16.6666672 15.55555563 23.5185194 21.839506Name: wylyw ، day taip: flwt 64 nwt keh aap PANDAS main ayk kalm ki kfayt shaary awsta ka hasab lghanay kay liye kesi bhi dayta frym ka astamal krsktay hayn۔aap hasab ktab ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye tarykha kar kay mkhtlf dyghr dlail bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay aydajst pyramytr ko kfayt shaary harkt pzayr awsta kay wzan ko aydajst karnay kay liye aur MIN_PERIODS pyramytr ko kam sy kam mdtwn ki kam sy kam tadad ki wzuahat karnay kay liye zurwry hay js ki wzuahat karnay kay liye kam aza kam tadad ki wzuahat ki jaskay۔aap chlty awsta ka hasab lghanay kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn ko bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay sadha harkt pzayr awsta aur wzan ki awsta awsta۔

Question: dayta frym main kalm sy aaly akdar kay sath upar ki n ktaaryn nkalnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main kalm sy aaly akdar kay sath tap ayn ktaaryn nkalnay kay l you ، aap nlargest () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: dlchspy kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalm par NLARGET () kay tarykha kar ko aaly akdar kay sath upar ki N ktaaryn nkalnay kay liay۔PDAS btawr PD# wylywza dayta = {'wylyw' kay kalm kay sath dayta frym bnaiyn: [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# upar 3 ktaaryn nkalyn۔'wylyw' kalm tap_n = df.nlargest (3 ، 'wylyw')# rzalt prnt (tap_n) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'wylyw' kalm sy aaly akdar kay sath upar 3 ktaaryn nkalnay kay liye nlargest () tarykha astamal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main ktaarwn ko mtghyr tap_n main astwr krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main 3 ktaaryn aur 1 kalm hay js main tap 3 ktaaryn hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: wylyw 3 251 204 20 nwt keh aap kesi bhi dayta frym ko pandawn main NLARGET () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kalm sy aaly akdar kay sath upar N ktaaryn nkalnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔aap nkalnay ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye tarykha kar kay mkhtlf dyghr dlail bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay kyp pyramytr ko yeh btanay kay liye keh kon sy daplykyt akdar rkhna hay aur kalm pyramytr ko mtadd kalmwn ki wzuahat karna haay۔aap ktaaryn nkalnay kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn jesay trtyb_awlwza () tarykha aur astfsar () tarykha ۔1 ghydayksfwrjyjs 2 pydayta 3 jy ay ay ays ayf ayf ays 4 dablyw 3 ays sy aw ayl ays swrs bhi astamal krsktay hayn۔

Question: dayta frym main ayk sy zayada bainry kalmwn main zamrha dar akdar kay kalm ko tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main ayk sy zayada bainry kalmwn main dwtwk akdar kay kalm ko tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap get_dmimes () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: zamrha dar akdar kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalm par ghyt_damy () ka tarykha kar ko ayk sy zayada bainry kalmwn main tbdyl karnay kay l .۔# dwtwk wylyw dayta = {'rngh' kay kalm kay sath dayta frym bnaiyn: ['srkh' ، 'sbza' ، 'nylay' ، 'srkh' ، 'ghryn']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# ko tbdyl karain 'rnghyn kalm main ayk sy zayada bainry kalm dammywn = pd.get_dummies (df ['Color'])# bainry kalmwn ko asal dayta frymdaf = pd.concat ([df ، dummies] ، mhawr = 1) kay sath jwrayn# ntyjha ka nshan (df) dasplay karain (df)yha kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'rngh' kalm ko mtadd bainry kalmwn main tbdyl karnay kay liye get_dmimes () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur is kay ntyjay main bainry kalm mtghyr damywn main astwr krta haay۔as kay bad kwda kalmwn kay mhawr kay sath asal dayta frym kay sath bainry kalmwn ko jwranay kay liye kwnkyt () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur mtghyr day ayf main ntyjay main pyda hony waly dayta frym ko astwr krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main bainry kalmwn kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 4 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: rnghyn nylay rngh kay sbza srkh 0 ryda 0 0 11 ghryn 0 1 02 blyw 1 0 03 ryda 0 0 14 ghryn 0 1 0 nwt karain keh aap kesi bhi dayta frym ko ayk sy zayada bainry kalmwn main tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal krsktay haynpandawn main get_dummies () ka tarykha۔aap tbadlwn ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye tarykha kar kay mkhtlf dyghr dlail bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay bainry kalmwn kay liye ayk sabkha ki wzuahat karnay kay liye sabkha pyramytr aur pehla bainry kalm chhwranay kay liye darap_fyrst pyramytr۔aap dayta ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klaswn kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay ghrwp baiy () dayta ko ayk kalm aur pywt_tybl () kay zaryaha dayta ghrwp karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar ka ayk mhawr jdwl bnanay kay liay۔

Question: dayta frym ko farwrda bhr kar ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym ko farwrda bhr kar ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalnay kay l you ، aap 'fill' par syt tarykha pyramytr kay sath flna () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: ghmshdha akdar kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ dayta frym par flna () ka tarykha kar ko aaghay brahanay kay liay۔ghmshdha kdrwn kay sath ayk dayta frym = {'wylyw': [10 ، np.nan ، 15 ، np.nan ، 20]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# farwrda 'wylyw' kalm day ayf ['wylyw main ghmshdha akdar ko pُr kryn(bhra hawa) ']'] = day ayf ['wylyw']۔ flna (tarykha = 'fill')# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad 'wylyw' kalm main ghmshdha akdar ko aaghay brahanay kay liye 'FFLE' par syt tarykha kar pyramytr kay sath flna () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur 'wylyw (bhry hawiy)' namy ayk niay kalm main ntyjay main bhray hoey akdar ko astwr krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hain jn main bhra hoa kalm haay۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: wylyw wylyw (bhry hawiy) 0 10.0 10.01 nan 10.02 15.0 15.03 nan 15.04 20.0 20.0 nwt karain keh aap pandawn main flna () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ghmshdha akdar ko aaghay brahanay kay liye kesi bhi dayta frym ko astamal krsktay hayn۔aap bhrnay ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye tarykha kar kay mkhtlf dyghr dlail bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay had kay pyramytr ko bhrnay kay liye lghatar ghmshdha akdar ki tadad ko mhadwd karnay kay liye aur jghha jghha dayta frym main trmym karnay kay liye un plys pyramytr۔aap dayta ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay darapna () ko ghmshdha akdar kay sath ktaarwn ya kalmwn ko chhwranay kay liye aur ghmshdha akdar ko antrpwlyt karnay kay liay۔

Question: ryjyks mych kay ntyjay par mbny dayta frym main nya kalm bnanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey ryjyks mych kay ntyjay par mbny dayta frym main ayk nya kalm bnanay kay l you ، aap str.extract () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: dawr kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ mtalwbha pytrn ko nkalnay kay liye kalm par str.extract () ka tarykha kal kryn۔astrnghs dayta = {'mtn' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: ['kymt $ 10 haay' ، 'kymt $ 20 haay' ، 'kymt $ 15 haay']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# kymt sy kymt nkalynryjyks pytrn day ayf ['kymt'] = day ayf ['mtn'] ka astamal karty hoey 'tykst' kalm۔lght aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh ryjyks pytrn ka astamal karty hoey 'tykst' kalm sy kymt nkalnay kay liye str.extract () ka tarykha astamal krta hay jo ayk daalr kay nshan sy mmasal hawta hay js kay bad ayk ya zayada handsay hawtay hain aur 'kymt' kay nam sy ayk niay kalm main ntyjha akhza krdha akdar ko astwr karty hayn۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 3 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: tykst prais 0 kymt 10 101 hay kymt 20 202 hay kymt $ 15 15 nwt hay keh aap kesi bhi dayta frym ko astamal krsktay hain takha Str.extract (regex mych kay ntyjay par mbny ayk nya kalm bnaya jaskay () pandawn main tarykha۔aap nkalnay ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye tarykha kar kay mkhtlf dyghr dlail bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay kesi syryza ko waps karna hay ya kesi dayta frym aur jhndawn kay pyramytr ko ryjyks jhndawn ki wzuahat karnay kay liye yeh kntrwl karnay kay liye twsya pyramytr۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ko bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay str.replace () ko strings aur str.split () ko tksym karnay kay liye astrnghs۔

Question: kesi dayta frym main kalm main kesi kdr kay wakaat ki mjmway ghnty ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey kesi dayta frym main kesi kalm main kesi kdr kay wakaat ki mjmway ghnty ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap ghrwp baiy () kay tarykha kar kay sath kmm () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: akdar kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalm par ghrwp baiy () kay tarykha kar ko mtalwbha wylyw kay zaryaha akdar ko ghrwp karnay kay l .۔ wakaat ki mjmway ghnty ka hasab lghanay kay liye ghrwpda akdar par kmm () kay tarykha kar ko kal kryn۔ksy niay kalm main ntyjay main mjmway ghnty ko zakhyrha kryn۔ yahan ki ayk msaal: PD# kay tawr par paiythwnympwrt pandaas wylyw daata = {'wylyw' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20]} df = pd.dataframe(aadad wa shmar)# 'wylyw' kalm day ayf ['mjmway ghnty'] = (day ayf ['wylyw'] == 20) main kymt 20 kay wakaat ki mjmway ghnty ka hasab lghaiyn۔()# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh mtalwbha kdr kay zaryaha 'wylyw' kalm main akdar ko ghrwp karnay kay liye ghrwp baiy () kay tarykha kar ka astamal krta hay aur kymt 20 kay wakaat ki mjmway ghnty ka hasab lghanay kay liye ghrwpda akdar par kmm () kay tarykha kar ko kal krta haay۔ ntyjay main mjmway ghnty haay۔ayk niay kalm main zakhyrha kya jata hay jsay 'mjmway ghnty' kehty hayn۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: wylyw mjmway ghnty 10 01 20 12 15 03 25 04 20 2 nwt keh aap kesi bhi dayta frym ko ghrwp baiy kay sath kmm () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kesi kalm main kesi kdr kay wkwa pzayr ghnty kay liye astamal krsktay hain (() ()) pandawn main tarykha۔aap hasab ktab ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye tarykha kar kay mkhtlf dyghr dlail bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay mhawr pyramytr kay zaryaha mhawr ko ghrwp main byan karnay kay liye aur akdar kay zaryaha ghrwpwn ko trtyb denay kay liye pyramytr trtyb dyn۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klaswn kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ko bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay wylyw_kwnt () mnfrd akdar aur mhawr_tybl () kay wakaat ko ghnnay kay liye aadad wa shmar ka ayk mhawr jdwl bnanay kay liay۔

Question: dawr kay kalm ko dayta frym main ayk wazuha dayta ki ksm main tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main tarwn kay kalm ko ayk wazuha dayta ki ksm main tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap 'zamrha' dlyl kay sath ASTYPE () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: astrnghza kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalm par ASTYPE () kay tarykha kar ko ayk wazuha dayta ki ksm main tbdyl karnay kay liay۔PD# astrnghs dayta = {'rngh' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: ['srkh' ، 'sbza' ، 'nylay' ، 'srkh' ، 'sbza']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# ko tbdyl karain 'rnghyn 'kalm ayk zamrha dar dayta taipdaf [' rnghyn (zamrha dar) '] = df [' rngh ']۔ aystaip (' zamrha ')# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy rwan main tfwyzu krta haaymtghyr DF.as kay bad 'rngh' kalm ko ayk wazuha dayta ki ksm main tbdyl karnay kay liye 'zamrha' dlyl kay sath ASTYPE () ka tarykha astamal kya jata hay aur 'rngh (zamrha dar)' kay nam sy ayk niay kalm main ntyjay main hony waly zamrha dar dayta ki ksm ko astwr krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: rnghyn rngh (zamrha dar) 0 ryda ryda 1 ghryn ghryn 2 blyw 3 ryda 4 ghryn ghryn nwt jo aap kesi bhi dayta frym ko tarwn kay kalm ko pandaas main aystaip () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk wazuha dayta taip main tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔aap tbadlwn ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye tarykha kar kay mkhtlf dyghr dlail bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay zamrha jat pyramytr ko zamrha dar dayta ki ksm kay zamray ki wzuahat karnay aur aardarda pyramytr ki wzuahat karnay kay liye yeh wazuha karnay kay liye keh zamrha dar dayta ki ksm ka hakm diya gaya haay۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ko bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay wylyw_kwnt () ko mnfrd akdar aur ghrwp baiy () kay wakaat ko ghnnay kay liye ayk kalm kay zaryaha aadad wa shmar ko ghrwp kryn۔

Question: dayta frym main do kalmwn kay mabyn kwsain mmasalt ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main do kalmwn kay mabyn kwsain mmasalt ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap Sklearn.Metrics.pairive madaywl sy Cosine_simility () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: addy akdar kay do kalmwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalmwn par Cosine_simarity () fnkshn ko kwsain ki mmasalt ka hasab lghanay kay liye fnkshn kryn۔ astwr kay ntyjay main kwsain mmasalt ko ayk niay mtghyr myn۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: PDFROMOLINE kay tawr par azaghr pwrt pandaas۔mytrks.pyir waiza ampwrt kwsain_symylyty# addy akdar kay do kalmwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn = {'aay': [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] ، 'by': [5 ، 4 ، 3 ، 2 ، 1]} day ayf= pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'A' aur 'B' kalmskws_sm = Cosine_simarity (df ['a']] ، df [['b']]) kay darmiyan kwsain mmasalt ka hasab lghaiyn)yha kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh asklrn.mytrks sy kwsain_symryty () fnkshn ka astamal krta haay۔ pyry wyza madaywl kalmwn ko 2D safwn kay btawr kalmwn ko 'A' aur 'B' kalmwn kay mabyn kwsain ki mmasalt ka hasab ktab karnay kay liye astamal krta haay۔ntyjay main kwsain mmasalt mtghyr COS_SIM main mhafwza haay۔ntyjay main aaؤt pt ayk 2D srny hay js main kwsain mmasalt ki kymt haay۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: [[0.22975292] [0.4472136] [0.67419986] [0.89442719] [1۔]] nwt karain keh aap pandawn main Cosine_simarity () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey do kalmwn kay mabyn kwsain mmasalt ka hasab lghanay kay liye kesi bhi dayta frym ka astamal krsktay hayn۔aap hasab ktab ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye fnkshn kay mkhtlf dyghr dlail bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay ghhnay_ aaؤt pt pyramytr ko yeh btanay kay liye keh aya ghhnay ya wyrl aaؤt pt aur N_JOBS pyramytr ko mtwazay mlazamtwn ki tadad ko chlanay kay liye waps karna haay۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay kalm () kalmwn kay mabyn artbata ka hasab lghanay kay liye aur aadad wa shmar kay khlasaha aadadwshmar haasal karnay kay liye ()

Question: ghmshdha akdar ko dayta frym main bhrnay kay zaryaha ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main psmandha akdar ko hayndal karnay kay l you ، aap 'BFILL' par syt tarykha kar pyramytr kay sath flna () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: ghmshdha akdar kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ dayta frym par psmandha hony kay liye flna () tarykha par kal kryn۔ghmshdha kdrwn kay sath ayk dayta frym = {'wylyw': [10 ، NP.Nan ، 15 ، NP.Nan ، 20]} DF = PD.Dataframe (dayta)# psmandha 'wylyw' kalm day ayf ['wylyw main ghmshdha akdar ko pُr kryn(bhra hawa) ']] = day ayf [' wylyw ']۔ flna (tarykha =' byfl ')# rzalt prnt (day ayf) dasplay karain is kwda sy kesi lght sy dayta frym tyar hawta hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'kymt' kalm main ghmshdha akdar ko pُr karnay kay liye 'BFILL' par syt tarykha kar pyramytr kay sath flna () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur 'wylyw (bhry hawiy)' namy ayk niay kalm main ntyjay main bhray hoey akdar ko astwr krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hain jn main bhra hoa kalm haay۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: wylyw wylyw (bhry hawiy) 0 10.0 10.01 nan 15.02 15.0 15.03 nan 20.04 20.0 20.0 nwt karain keh aap pandawn main flna () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey psmandha akdar ko psmandha pُr karnay kay liye kesi bhi dayta frym ko astamal krsktay hayn۔aap bhrnay ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye tarykha kar kay mkhtlf dyghr dlail bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay had kay pyramytr ko bhrnay kay liye lghatar ghmshdha akdar ki tadad ko mhadwd karnay kay liye aur jghha jghha dayta frym main trmym karnay kay liye un plys pyramytr۔aap dayta ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay darapna () ko ghmshdha akdar kay sath ktaarwn ya kalmwn ko chhwranay kay liye aur ghmshdha akdar ko antrpwlyt karnay kay liay۔

Question: kesi dusray kalm kay ahaday par mbny dayta frym main nya kalm bnanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey kesi dusray kalm kay drjha ki bnyad par dayta frym main ayk nya kalm bnanay kay l you ، aap rynk () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: addy akdar kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalm par rynk () kay tarykha kar ko hr kdr kay drjha ka hasab lghanay kay liay۔addy akdar kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn = {'wylyw': [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'wylyw' kalm day ayf ['rynk' kay drjha ka hasab lghaiyn]= DF ['wylyw']. rynk ()# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad 'wylyw' kalm main hr kdr kay drjha ka hasab lghanay kay liye rynk () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur ntyjay main hony waly drjat ko 'rynk' kay nam sy ayk niay kalm main astwr krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: wylyw rynk 0 1.01 20 3.52 15 2.03 25 5.04 20 3.5 nwt karain keh aap pandawn main rynk () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kesi aur kalm ki bnyad par ayk nya kalm bnanay kay liye kesi bhi dayta frym ko astamal krsktay hayn۔aap drjha bndy ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye tarykha kar kay mkhtlf dyghr dlail bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay rynkngh kay tarykha kar ki wzuahat karnay kay liye tarykha kar pyramytr aur chrahnay waly pyramytr ko yeh btanay kay liye keh chrahnay ya nzawl trtyb main drjha bndy karna hay ya nhayn۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ko bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay kesi kalm aur ghrwp baiy () kay zaryaha dayta ko trtyb denay kay liye trtyb_alaiws () ko ayk kalm kay zaryaha dayta ghrwp karnay kay liay۔

Question: dayta frym main kalm ki mjmway fysad ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey kesi dayta frym main kalm ki mjmway fysad ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap kmm () tarykha aur rkm () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: addy akdar kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalm par kmm () kay tarykha kar ko akdar kay mjmway rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liay۔ kalm par jma () kay tarykha kar ko tamam akdar kay jwraay ka hasab lghanay kay liye kal kryn۔. tamam akdar kay mjmwaha kay zaryaha mjmway rkm ko tksym karain aur mjmway fysad ka hasab lghanay kay liye 100 sy zurb kryn۔ ayk niay kalm main ntyjay main mjmway fysad ko zakhyrha kryn۔ yahan ki ayk msaal: py day kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt pandaas ko py day kay tawr par aadad wa shmar kay aadad wa shmar kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔= {'wylyw': [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'wylyw' kalm day ayf ['mjmway fysad'] = 100 * df ['kymt [' kymt 'ky mjmway fysad ka hasab lghaiyn'] .kwmsm () / df [' wylyw ']. SUM ()# dasplay prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad 'wylyw' kalm main akdar kay jma krdha mjmwaha aur 'wylyw' kalm main tamam akdar kay jwraay ka hasab lghanay kay liye rkm () kay tarykha kar ka hasab lghanay kay liye yeh kmm () tarykha astamal krta haay۔as kay bad mjmway fysad ka hasab lghanay kay liye mjmway tawr par mjmway fysad ko tksym krta hay aur zurb ko 100 sy brahata haay۔ntyjay main mjmway fysad ayk niay kalm main mhafwza kya jata hay jsay 'mjmway fysad' kehty hayn۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: kymt mjmway fysad 10 10.01 20 40.02 15 55.03 25 90.04 20 100.0 nwt karain keh aap kesi bhi dayta frym ko pandawn main cumsum () kay tarykha kar aur SUM () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kalm ki mjmway fysad ka hasab lghanay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay drjha () kalm kay drjha ka hasab lghanay aur aadad wa shmar kay khlasaay kay aadadwshmar haasal karnay kay liye () byan karnay kay liay۔

Question: dayta frym main do kalmwn kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn aur ntyjha ki bnyad par ayk nya kalm bnaiyn۔
Answer: dayta frym main do kalmwn kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghanay aur pandawn ka astamal karty hoey ntyjha ki bnyad par ayk nya kalm bnanay kay l you ، aap - aaprytr astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: addy akdar kay do kalmwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ dusray sy ayk kalm ko sab sy pehlay - aaprytr ka astamal karty hoey frk ka hasab lghanay kay liay۔addy akdar kay do kalmwn kay sath dayta frym = {'A': [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20] ، 'B': [5 ، 15 ، 10 ، 20 ، 15]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)#'A' aur 'B' kalm ays day ayf ['frk'] = DF ['A'] - DF ['B']# dasplay prnt (DF) kay darmiyan frk ka hasab lghaiyn yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy tfwyzu krta haaymtghyr DF kw۔as kay bad yeh frk ka hasab lghanay kay liye 'A' kalm sy 'B' kalm ko ghhta denay kay liye - aaprytr ka astamal krta hay aur 'frk' namy ayk niay kalm main ntyjay main hony waly frk ko astwr krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 3 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: ayk by frk 0 5 51 20 15 52 15 10 53 25 20 54 20 15 5 nwt karain keh aap pandawn main aaprytr ka astamal karty hoey do kalmwn kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghanay kay liye kesi bhi dayta frym ka astamal krsktay hayn۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klaswn kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay drjha () kalm kay drjay ka hasab lghanay aur aadad wa shmar kay khlasaay kay aadadwshmar haasal karnay kay liye () byan karnay kay liay۔

Question: kalm main ghmshdha akdar ki tadad ki bnyad par dayta frym main ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey kalm main ghmshdha akdar ki tadad par mbny dayta frym main ktaarwn ko fltr karnay kay l you ، aap isnull () tarykha aur SUM () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: akdar kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalm par isnull () kay tarykha kar ko kal karain takha ghmshdha akdar ka bwlyn mask bnaiyn۔ ghmshdha akdar ki tadad ko ghnnay kay liye bwlyn mask par rkm () ka tarykha kar kal kryn۔kalm main ghmshdha akdar ki tadad ki bnyad par dayta frym ko fltr karnay kay liye bwlyn mask ka astamal kryn۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: PD# kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt pandaas wylyw dayta = {'wylyw' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: [10 ، koi bhi nahin ، 15 ، koi bhi nhayn.rzalt prnt (DF_FILTERED) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'wylyw' kalm main ghmshdha akdar ka bwlyn mask bnanay kay liye isnull () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur ghmshdha akdar ki tadad ko ghnnay kay liye rkm () ka tarykha۔as kay bad yeh kalm main ghmshdha akdar ki tadad ki bnyad par dayta frym ko fltr karnay kay liye bwlyn mask ka astamal krta haay۔as msaal main ، kwda 'wylyw' kalm main 2 sy kam ghmshdha akdar kay sath sirf ktaaryn rkhnay kay liye dayta frym ko fltr krta haay۔ntyjay main fltr shuda dayta frym main 3 ktaaryn aur 1 kalm haay۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: wylyw 0 10.02 15.04 20.0 nwt keh aap kesi bhi dayta frym ko aainswl () kay tarykha kar aur pandawn main ayk kalm main ghmshdha akdar ki tadad ki bnyad par fltr karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay flna () ghmshdha akdar ko pُr karnay kay liye aur darapna () ko ghmshdha akdar kay sath chhwranay kay liay۔

Question: dayta frym main dayt taim akdar kay kalm ko haftay kay dn main tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main dayt taim akdar kay kalm ko haftay kay dn main tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap day ty ayksysr aur ays ty aar taim () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: dayt taim wylywza kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ dayt taim praprtyza tak rsaiy kay liye kalm par day ty ayksysr ko kal kryn۔ dayt taim praprtyza par STRFTIME () kay tarykha kar ko haftha kay dn kay tawr par dayt taim wylywza ko farmyt karnay kay liay۔haftay kay ntyjay main ayk niay kalm main zakhyrha kryn۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: py day kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt pandaas PD# dayta taim wylywza daata = {'tarykh' kay kalm kay sath dayta frym bnaiyn: ['2022-06-01' ، '2022-06-02 '،' 2022-06-03 ']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)#' tarykh 'kalm ko haftha kay dn main tbdyl karain [' haftha ka dn '] = pd.to_dattime (df [' tarykh '']). dt.strfime ('٪ A')# dasplay prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda ayk lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'tarykh' kalm ko dayt taim wylywza main tbdyl karnay kay liye PD.TO_DATETIME () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur dayt taim praprtyza tak rsaiy haasal karnay kay liye day ty ayksysr۔as kay bad yeh dayt taim akdar ko haftay kay dn kay tawr par farmyt karnay kay liye strfime () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur 'daay aaf haftha' kay nam sy ayk niay kalm main haftay kay ntyjay main dn ko astwr krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 3 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: haftha ka dn 2022-06-01 bdh 1 2022-06-02 jmarat 2 2022-06-03 jmaha ka nam hay keh aap kesi bhi dayta frym ko dayt taim wylywza kay kalm ko haftay kay dn main tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal krsktay haynpandawn main day ty ayksysr aur astrf taim () ka tarykha۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay TO_PERIOD () dayta taim ki akdar ko mdt main tbdyl karnay kay liye aur dwbarha trtyb denay kay liye ()

Question: kesi dusray kalm main wzan kay btawr dayta frym main mtadd kalmwn main akdar kay wzan waly rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: dayta frym main mtadd kalmwn main akdar kay wzan waly rkm ka hasab lghanay kay l another ، kesi dusray kalm ko pandawn ka astamal karty hoey wzan kay tawr par astamal karty hoey ، aap zurb () tarykha aur rkm () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: addy akdar kay kalmwn aur wzan kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalmwn par zurb () kay tarykha kar ko is kay wzan sy hr kymt ko zurb denay kay liay۔ wzan kay hasab sy ntyjha akhza karnay waly msanwaat par rkm () kay tarykha kar ko kal kryn۔sum.store kay ntyjay main ayk niay kalm main wzan ka mjmwaha۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: PD# kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt pandaas addy akdar kay kalmwn aur wyt dayta = {'A' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20] ، 'by': [5 ، 15 ، 10 ، 20 ، 15] ، 'wzan': [0.5 ، 0.3 ، 0.2 ، 0.4 ، 0.1]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# kay wzan waly rkm ka hasab lghaiyn '۔A 'awr' B 'kalm' wzan 'kalm day ayf [' wzany rkm '] = df [[' a '،' b ']] ka astamal karty hawiay۔ zurb (df [' wzan '] ، mhawr = 0)= 1)# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'A' aur 'B' kalmwn main hr kdr ko zurb lghanay kay liye zurb () ka tarykha astamal krta hay js main 'wzan' kalm main is kay isi wzan aur hr saf kay wzan waly jwraay ka hasab lghanay kay liye rkm () ka tarykha haay۔as kay bad is kay ntyjay main wzan waly rkm ko ayk niay kalm main astwr kya jata hay jsay 'wytda sm' kehty hayn۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 4 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: A B wzan wala SUM0 10 5 0.5 7.51 20 15 0.3 13.52 15 10 0.2 5.03 25 20 0.4 18.04 20 15 0.1 3.5 nwt karain keh aap mtadd kalmwn main kdrwn kay wzan waly rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye kesi bhi dayta frym ka astamal krsktay hayn۔pandawn main zurb () kay tarykha kar aur rkm () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey wzan kay tawr par ayk aur kalm۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay drjha () kalm kay drjha ka hasab lghanay aur aadad wa shmar kay khlasaay kay aadadwshmar haasal karnay kay liye () byan karnay kay liay۔

Question: kesi haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym kay kalm main akdar ko tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey kesi haalt ki bnyad par dayta frym kay kalm main akdar ko tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap lwk [] fnkshn ya jahan () fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: akdar kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ akdar ko tbdyl karnay kay liye akdar ki nshandhay karnay kay liye haalt ki wzuahat kryn۔ lwk ko astamal karain [] fnkshn ya jahan () fnkshn ko haalt par mbny akdar ko tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal kryn۔ is kay ntyjay main dayta frym ko astwr kryn۔ayk niay mtghyr myn۔ yahan do msaalyn hayn: LOC [] fnkshn ka astamal: PD## kay tawr par paiythwnympwrt pandaas wylyw daata = {'wylyw' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20]} DF = PD.dataframe (dayta)# LOC [] df.loc [df ['value']> 20 ، 'wylyw'] = 30# is kay ntyjay main prnt (DF) dasplay krynkwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'wylyw' kalm main akdar ko tbdyl karnay kay liye LOC [] fnkshn ka astamal krta hay jo 20 sy zayada kymt 30 kay sath hayn۔ ntyjay main dayta frym main 5 ktaaryn aur 1 kalm hay js main tbdyl shuda akdar hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: wylyw 0 101 202 153 304 20 ka astamal jahan () fnkshn: py day kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt pandaas wylyw daata = {'wylyw' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20]}df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# jahan () df ['value'] = df ['wylyw'] ka astamal karty hoey 'wylyw' kalm main akdar ko tbdyl kryn۔ jahan (DF ['kdr'] <=20 ، 30)# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'wylyw' kalm main akdar ko tbdyl karnay kay liye jahan () fnkshn ka astamal krta hay jo 20 sy zayada kymt 30 kay sath haay۔ ntyjay main dayta frym main 5 ktaaryn aur 1 kalm tbdyl shuda akdar kay sath haay۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: wylyw 0 101 202 153 304 20 nwt keh aap kesi bhi dayta frym ko kalm main akdar ko tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hain js ki bnyad par lwk [] fnkshn ya pandawn main jahan () fnkshn ka astamal kya jata haay۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay flna () ghmshdha akdar ko pُr karnay kay liye aur darapna () ko ghmshdha akdar kay sath chhwranay kay liay۔

Question: ayk dayta frym main mtadd kalmwn kay zaryaha ghrwp krdha kalm main akdar ki rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main mtadd kalmwn kay zaryaha ghrwp krdha kalm main akdar kay jwraay ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap ghrwp baiy () tarykha aur rkm () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: addy akdar kay kalmwn aur ayk ya zayada kalmwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔har ghrwp main akdar kay jwraay ka hasab lghanay kay ntyjay main ghrwp۔ ayk niay dayta frym main ntyjay main jo kuch rkm haay۔ hr msaal: PD# kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt pandaas addy akdar kay kalmwn aur ayk ya zayada kalmwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn baiy dayta = {'ghrwp ': [' a '،' a '،' B '،' B '،' B '] ،' wylyw 1 ': [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20] ،' wylyw 2 ': [5 ، 15 ،10 ، 20 ، 15]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'ghrwp' kalm day ayf_sm = df.groupby ('ghrwp') kay zaryaha ghrwp krdha 'wylyw 1' aur 'wylyw 2' kalmwn kay jwraay ka hasab lghaiyn [['wylyw 1'.as kay bad hr ghrwp main 'wylyw 1' aur 'wylyw 2' kalmwn ki rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye 'ghrwp' kalm aur SUM () kay zaryaha dayta ko ghrwp karnay kay liye ghrwp baiy () ka tarykha astamal krta haay۔ntyjay ki rkm ayk niay dayta frym main mhafwza ki jati hay jsay DF_SUM kehty hayn۔ntyjay main dayta frym main 2 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hawtay hain jn main hr ghrwp main akdar ki rkm hawty haay۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: wylyw 1 wylyw 2 ghrwp ayk 30 20B 60 45Note js ko aap kesi bhi dayta frym ka astamal kesi kalm main kdrwn kay jwraay ka hasab lghanay kay liye astamal krsktay hain js main ghrwp baiy () kay tarykha kar aur pandawn main SUM () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ayk sy zayada kalmwn kay zaryaha ghrwp kya gaya haay۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klaswn kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay () hr ghrwp main akdar kay wsta ka hasab ktab karnay aur aadad wa shmar kay khlasaay kay aadadwshmar haasal karnay kay liye ()

Question: dayta frym ko ays kyw aylait dayta bys tybl main tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandaas dayta frym ko ays kyw aylait dayta bys tybl main tbdyl karnay kay l you ، aap dayta frym kay tw_ ays kyw ayl () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: ayk pandaas dayta frym bnaiyn۔ ays kyw aylait 3 pykyj ka astamal karty hoey ays kyw aylait dayta bys sy rabtaha kaim kryn۔ ays kyw aylt dayta bys main ayk tybl par dayta lkhnay kay liye dayta frym kay tw_ ays kyw ayl () ka tarykha astamal kryn۔pdimport sqlite3# ayk pandaas dataframedata = {'nam' bnaiyn: ['ayls' ، 'bab' ، 'charly'] ، 'amr': [25 ، 30 ، 35]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# kaim karain aksy SQLITE dayta byskwn = SQLITE3.Connect ('msaal kay tawr pr. DB') sy rabtaha kryn# SQLITE dayta bysdaf daat ty aw ays kyw ayl ('lwgh' ، if_exists = 'myn kesi tybl par dayta lkhnay kay liye dayta frym kay TO_SQL () ka tarykha astamal kryn'، andayks = ghlta)# dayta bys knkshn kwnn۔ klwza () ko band kryn۔as kay bad yeh SQLite3 pykyj aur knykt () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey SQLITE dayta bys sy rabtaha kaim krta haay۔as kay bad ays kyw aylait dayta bys main 'pyplza' namy tybl par dayta lkhnay kay liye dayta frym kay TO_SQL () ka tarykha astamal krta haay۔IF_EXISTS pyramytr tybl ko tbdyl karnay kay liye 'tbdyl' karnay kay liye tyar hay agar yeh pehlay sy mwjwd haay۔tybl par dayta frym andayks lkhnay sy bchnay kay liye andayks pyramytr ghalat par syt kya gaya haay۔aakhr main ، kwda kryb () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey dayta bys knkshn ko band krdyta haay۔ nwt karain keh aap kesi bhi pandaas dayta frym ko astamal krsktay hain takha isy SQLITE dayta bys tybl main TO_SQL () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey tbdyl kya jaskay۔aap dayta frym aur SQLite3 klaswn kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ko dayta ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay READ_SQL () ayk SQLITE dayta bys sy dayta frym main dayta ko prahnay kay liye aur dayta bys par aml karnay kay liye ()

Question: kesi dayta frym main kalm kay mjmway lagh rytrn ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main kalm kay mjmway lagh rytrn ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap kmm () tarykha aur lagh () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: addy akdar kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalm par lagh () kay tarykha kar ko hr kdr kay kdrty lwghrthm ka hasab lghanay kay liay۔lwghrthmza۔ astwr kay ntyjay main ayk niay kalm main mjmway tawr par mjmway rkm haay۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: PDIMPORT numpy kay tawr par pythwnympwrt pandaas NP# addy wylyw dayta = {'wylyw' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20]} df = pd.dataframe (aadad wa shmar)# 'wylyw' kalm day ayf ['mjmway lagh rytrn'] kay mjmway lagh rytrn ka hasab lghaiyn۔(day ayf) yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh 'wylyw' kalm main hr kdr kay kdrty lwghrthm ka hasab lghanay kay liye lagh () ka tarykha astamal krta hay aur lwghrthm kay mjmway rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye 'wylyw' kalm aur cumsum () tarykha kar ka hasab lghata haay۔as kay bad is kay ntyjay main mjmway rkm ko ayk niay kalm main astwr kya jata hay js ka nam 'mjmway lagh rytrn' haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: wylyw mjmway lagh un return0 10 2.3025851 20 3.9120232 15 4.7874923 25 6.1633154 20 7.0900777 nwt keh aap Cumms () kay tarykha kar ()) kay tarykha kar ()) kay tarykha kar aur lagh un kalm kay mjmway lagh un return ka hasab lghanay kay liye kesi bhi dayta frym ka astamal krsktay hain ()) pandawn main tarykha۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay drjha () kalm kay drjha ka hasab lghanay aur aadad wa shmar kay khlasaha aadadwshmar haasal karnay kay liye byan ()۔

Question: dayta frym main bahamy mdakhlt krkay ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym main antrpwlyt krkay ghmshdha akdar ko snbhalnay kay l you ، aap antrpwlyt () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: ghmshdha akdar kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ ghmshdha akdar ko pُr karnay kay liye antrypwlyt () ka tarykha astamal kryn۔ ntyjay main dayta frym ko ayk niay mtghyr main astwr kryn۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: pydaynympwrt pandaas btawr Pdimport numppy NP# kay sath dayta frym bnaiynghmshdha akdar = {'wylyw': [10 ، NP.Nan ، 15 ، NP.nan ، 20]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# ghmshdha akdar ko 'wylyw' kalm day ayf ['wylyw'] = day ayf main antrpwlyt kryn['wylyw']۔ antrpwlyt ()# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad lkyry antrpwlyshn ka astamal karty hoey 'wylyw' kalm main ghmshdha akdar ko pُr karnay kay liye antrpwlyt () ka tarykha astamal krta haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym main 5 ktaaryn aur 1 kalm hay js main antrpwlytda akdar hayn۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: wylyw 0 10.001 12.502 15.003 17.504 20.00 nwt keh aap pandawn main antrpwlyt () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ghmshdha akdar ko antrpwlyt karnay kay liye kesi bhi dayta frym ka astamal krsktay hayn۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay flna () ayk mkhsawsa kdr kay sath ghmshdha akdar ko pُr karnay kay liye aur ktaaat kay sath ktaarwn ya kalmwn ko chhwranay kay liay۔

Question: do dayta taim kalmwn kay mabyn frk ki bnyad par dayta frym main nya kalm bnanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey do dayt taim kalmwn kay mabyn frk ki bnyad par dayta frym main ayk nya kalm bnanay kay l you ، aap dayt taim madaywl aur atalak () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: dayt taim akdar kay do kalmwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ hr saf main dayt taim akdar kay mabyn frk ka hasab lghanay kay liye () ka tarykha astamal kryn۔dayt taim ampwrt dayt taim# dayt taim wylywza daata kay do kalmwn kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn = {'astart taim': ['2022-06-01 10:00:00' ، '2022-06-02 11:00:00' ، '2022-06-03 12:00:00 '] ،' akhttamy wkt ': [' 2022-06-01 11:00:00 '،' 2022-06-02 12:00:00 '،' 2022-06-03 13: 00: 00 ']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)#' astart taim 'awr' akhttamy wkt 'kalm ays day ayf [' dwranyha '] = df.apply kay darmiyan frk ka hasab lghaiyn۔'akhttamy wkt'] ، '٪ y- ٪ m- ٪ d ٪ h: ٪ m: ٪ s')-dayt taim.strpaim (ktaar ['shrwa ka wkt'] ، '٪ y- ٪ m- ٪ d ٪ h:٪ M: ٪ s ') ، mhawr = 1)# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi
