Question: dayta frym main kalm main mnfrd akdar ki frykwiynsy ghnty ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey kesi dayta frym main kalm main mnfrd akdar ki frykwiynsy ghnty ka hasab lghanay kay l you ، aap wylyw_kwnt () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: akdar kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalm main mnfrd akdar ki tadd ghnty ka hasab lghanay kay liye wylyw_kwnt () ka tarykha astamal kryn۔# wylyw dayta = {'wylyw' kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn: ['a' ، 'b' ، 'c' ، 'a' ، 'b']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# frykwiynsy ghnty ka hasab lghaiyn'wylyw' kalm wylyw_kaؤnts = day ayf ['wylyw'] main anwkhy akdar ky۔ wylyw_ akaؤnts ()# rzalt prnt (wylyw_kaؤnts) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad 'wylyw' kalm main mnfrd akdar ki frykwiynsy ghnty ka hasab lghanay kay liye wylyw_kwnt () ka tarykha astamal krta haay۔ntyjay main tadd ki ghnty ayk niay mtghyr main mhafwza ki jati hay jsay wylyw_kwnt kehty hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: ayk 2b 2c 1name: wylyw ، day taip: ant 644 nwt keh aap pandawn main wylyw_kwnt () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kalm main mnfrd akdar ki frykwynsy ghnty ka hasab lghanay kay liye kesi bhi dayta frym ka astamal krsktay hayn۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay ghrwp baiy () ghrwp kay aadad wa shmar ko kalm kay zaryaha aur byan karain () aadad wa shmar kay khlasaay kay aadadwshmar haasal karnay kay liay۔

Question: "mkhtlf tarykh kay farmyts ko snbhaltay hoey ، dayta taim aabjykt main tar kay kalm ko dayt taim aabjykt main tbdyl karnay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔"
Answer: kesi dayta frym main dayda taim aabjykt main dawr kay kalm ko tbdyl karnay kay liye ، pandawn ka astamal karty hoey mkhtlf tarykh kay farmyts ko snbhalnay kay l you ، aap tw_dayt taim () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: tarykhwn ki nmaindghy karnay waly tar kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ tarwn ko dayt taim aabjykt main tbdyl karnay kay liye to_dateme () ka tarykha astamal kryn۔ ayk niay kalm main ntyjay main dayt taim aabjykt ko astwr kryn۔ hr ayk msaal: PD## tkhlyk kryndayts dayta = {'tarykh' ki nmaindghy karnay waly tar kay kalm wala ayk dayta frym: ['2022-06-01' ، '02/06/2022 '،' 2022-06-03 ']} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)#'tarykh' kalm ko dayt taim aabjykt day ayf main tbdyl karain ['tarykh'] = pd.to_datetime (df ['tarykh'] ، infer_datetime_format = true)# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy tfwyzu krta haaymtghyr DF.as kay bad yeh 'tarykh' kalm main dawr ko dayt taim aabjykt main tbdyl karnay kay liye TO_DATETIME () ka tarykha astamal krta haay۔anfr_dayt taim_fwrmyt pyramytr tarykhwn ki shkl ka khud bkhwd ptha lghanay kay liye drst haay۔ntyjay main dayt taim aabjykt 'tarykh' kalm main mhafwza hayn۔ntyjay main dayta frym main tbdyl shuda dayt taim aabjykt kay sath 3 ktaaryn aur 1 kalm haay۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: tarykh 2022-06-011 2022-02-062 2022-06-03NOTE keh aap kesi bhi dayta frym ko dawr kay kalm ko pandawn main tw_dayt taim () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey dayta taim aabjykt main tbdyl karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔aap dayta ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ko bhi astamal krsktay hain ، jesay astrf taim () dayt taim aabjykt ko astrnghza aur ghrwp baiy () kay tawr par farmyt kay tawr par farmyt karnay kay liye ()

Question: dayta frym kay kalm main lghatar ktaarwn kay darmiyan fysad ki tbdyly ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: pandawn ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym kay kalm main lghatar ktaarwn kay mabyn fysad ki tbdyly ka hasab lghanay kay liye ، aap py sy ty_chynj () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: addy akdar kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ kalm main lghatar ktaarwn kay darmiyan fysad ki tbdyly ka hasab lghanay kay liye PCT_CHANGE () ka tarykha astamal kryn۔PD# addy akdar kay kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn = {'wylyw': [10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# 'kymt' main lghatar ktaarwn kay darmiyan fysad ki tbdyly ka hasab lghaiyn۔kalm day ayf ['fysad tbdyly'] = DF ['wylyw']۔ pct_change ()# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr DF ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad 'wylyw' kalm main lghatar ktaarwn kay mabyn fysad ki tbdyly ka hasab lghanay kay liye yeh PCT_CHANGE () ka tarykha astamal krta haay۔ntyjay main fysad ki tbdyly ayk niay kalm main mhafwza ki jati hay jsay 'fysad tbdyly' kehty hayn۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 2 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: wylyw fysad tbdyly 0 NAN1 20 1.0000002 15 -0.2500003 25 0.6666674 20 -0.200000NOUT keh ntyjay main dayta frym ki pehli ktaar main NAN ki kymt hogi kywnkha wahan sy fysad ki tbdyly ka hasab lghanay kay liye koi pchhly ktaar nahin haay۔aap kesi bhi dayta frym ko pandawn main py sy ty_chynj () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey kalm main lghatar ktaarwn kay darmiyan fysad ki tbdyly ka hasab lghanay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay kmm () kalm aur flna () kay mjmway rkm ka hasab lghanay kay liye ghmshdha akdar ko pُr karnay kay liay۔

Question: kesi dusray kalm ko wzan kay btawr astamal karty hoey kesi dayta frym main kalm kay wzan waly wsta ka hasab lghanay kay liye kwda lkhyn۔
Answer: kesi dayta frym main kalm kay wzan waly wsylha ka hasab lghanay kay l another kesi dusray kalm ko wzan kay tawr par pandawn ka astamal karty hoey astamal karty hoey ، aap atalak () tarykha aur kstm fnkshn astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: addy akdar kay kalm aur wzan kay ayk aur kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn۔ ayk kstm fnkshn ki wzuahat karain jo kesi kalm kay wzan waly wsylha ko wzan kay tawr par astamal karty hayn۔addy akdar ka kalm aur wzan ka kalm۔ astwr kay ntyjay main wzan ka mtalb ayk niay mtghyr main haay۔ yahan ayk msaal haay: py day kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt pandaas addy akdar ka kalm aur wyt dayta = {'wylyw' kay ayk aur kalm kay sath ayk dayta frym bnaiyn:[10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 25 ، 20] ، 'wzan': [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5]} df = pd.dataframe (dayta)# kesi aysay kstm fnkshn ki wzuahat karain jo kalm kay wzan waly wsta ka hasab lghata haayayk aur kalm btawr wyt dayf wytda_myan (akdar ، wzan): wapsy (akdar * wzan).yha kwda kesi lght sy dayta frym bnata hay aur isy mtghyr day ayf ko tfwyzu krta haay۔as kay bad yeh ayk kstm fnkshn ki wzuahat krta hay jsay wytda_myan () kehty hain jo kesi kalm kay wzan waly wsylha ka hasab ktab kay tawr par kesi dusray kalm ka astamal karty hayn۔lymbdaa fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey 'wylyw' kalm aur 'wzan' kalm par kstm fnkshn ko laghw karnay kay liye astamal () tarykha astamal kya jata haay۔as kay ntyjay main wzan ka mtalb ayk niay mtghyr main mhafwza hay jsay wytda_myan kehty hayn۔aakhr main ، ntyjay main wzan ka mtalb ayk niay kalm main mhafwza kya jata hay jsay 'wytda myn' kehty hayn۔ntyjay main dayta frym main niay kalm kay sath 5 ktaaryn aur 3 kalm hayn۔as kwda ki pydawar yeh hawghy: wylyw wylyw wyt wytda yany 10 1 15.0000001 20 2 18.750000002 15 3 16.66666673 25 4 4 20.83333334 20 5 20.000000 nwt js main aap kalm kay wzan kay hasab sy kesi bhi dayta frym ka astamal kesi aur kalm ka astamal karty hoey wzan kay hasab sy kesi aur kalm ka astamal krsktay hain jesa keh wzan ka astamal karty hayn۔() pandawn main tarykha aur ayk kstm fnkshn۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay ghrwp baiy () ko kesi kalm kay zaryaha ghrwp dayta sy la kar aadad wa shmar kay khlasaay kay aadad wa shmar haasal karnay kay liay۔

Question: thakykaty aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha (ay day aay) kya hay aur dayta tjzayha main yeh kyon aham haay؟
Answer: ayksplwrytry dayta anylysys (ay day aay) aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha aur smjhnay ka ayk nktaha nzar hay js main aadad wa shmar ki aham khsawsayat ki khwj aur un ka khlasaha karna shaml haay۔ay day aay kiy wjwhaat ki bnaa par aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay main aham haay: ay day aay aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn ، rjhaanat aur talkat ki nshandhay karnay main mdd krta hay jo mfrwzuay pyda karnay aur mazeed tjzayha ki rhanmaiy kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔ aydaa aaؤt lyirza ، ghmshdha akdar aur dyghr bay zuabtaghywn ki nshandhay karnay main mdd krskta haay۔mzayd tjzayha karnay sy pehlay jn aadad wa shmar par twjha denay ki zurwrt hawskty haay۔ ay day aay tjzayha ki sadakt ko mtasar karnay waly aadad wa shmar main mmknha tasab ya hadwd ki nshandhay karnay main mdd krskta haay۔ ay day aay astamal karnay kay liye anthaaiy mnasb aadadwshmar kay tarykwn aur madalza ki nshandhay karnay main mdd krskta haay۔mzayd tjzayha۔ ay day aay main astamal hony wali kuch aam tknykwn main shaml hayn: wzuahaty aadadwshmar: aadad wa shmar ki tksym ko byan karnay kay liye wzuahaty aadadwshmar jesay wsta ، mydayn ، wzua ، mayary anharaf ، aur rynj ka hasab ktab۔ dayta tsawr: chart ، ghraf aur dyghr bsary nmaindghy ki tshkylnmwnwn aur rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar ky۔ dayta ki safaiy: dayta main ghmshdha akdar ، aaؤt lyirza aur dyghr bay zuabtaghywn ki nshandhay karna aur un sy nmtna۔ fychr anjynirngh: tjzayha ki drstghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye mwjwdha aadad wa shmar par mbny niy khsawsayat ya mtghyr bnana۔ haaipwthyss tystngh:aadadwshmar kay tystwn ka astamal is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye keh aya aadad wa shmar main mshahadha krdha nmwnwn ya talkat aadadwshmar kay lhaaza sy aham hayn۔ awwr ، ay day aay dayta tjzayha kay aml main ayk aham kdm hay jo is bat ko ykyny bnanay main mdd krskta hay keh is kay bad kay tjzayay drst ، drst aur kabl aatmad hayn۔

Question: aap azaghr main ay day aay kay liye zurwry laibryrywn ko kesay draamd karty hayn؟
Answer: azaghr main ay day aay kay liye zurwry laibryrywn ko draamd karnay kay l you ، aap mndrjha zayl laibryrywn ka astamal krsktay hayn: pandaas: dayta main hayra phyry aur tjzayha kay liye ayk laibryry jo braay daytasyts ko mwsar andaza main astwr karnay aur jwra twra karnay kay liye dayta dahanchay mhaya krty haay۔، ksayr jhaty safwn aur mytrk kay sath sath ryazuy kay afaal ki ayk rynj۔ mytplwtlyb: dayta wyzenaizayshn kay liye ayk laibryry jo chart ، ghraf ، aur dayta ki dyghr bsary nmaindghy kay l a bohat sy twlza mhaya krty haay۔ aadad wa shmar kay liye ayk laibryryjw mytplwtlyb daat ays sy py kay mkablay main zayada pychydha aur nfys tsawrat pyda karnay kay l a bohat sary twlza mhaya krta haay: sainsy kmpywtngh kay liye ayk laibryry jo aadad wa shmar kay tjzayha ، asalaha aur dyghr sainsy kamwn kay liye mtadd twlza mhaya krty haay۔ un laibryrywn ko draamd karnay kay l you ، aap mndrjha zayl astamal krsktay hayn۔kwda: paiythwnympwrt pandaas btawr py daympwrt nympy btawr ayn py aai aympwrt mytplwtlyb daat pyplwt kay tawr par Pltimport smndry bwrn kay tawr par Snsimport scipy.stats kay tawr par astyts kwda ko pandaas ، nam ، mytlwtlyb ، smndry tawfan ، aur askypy ko mayary arfysys py day ، ayn py ، py ayl ty ، ayn py ، py ayl ty ، ays ayn ays ka astamal karty hoey draamd krta haay۔yha laibryryan bohat sary twlza aur afaal mhaya krty hain jo ay day aay kay liye karaamd hain ، bshmwl dayta hayra phyry ، dayta wyzenlaizayshn ، shmaryaty tjzayha ، aur mzayd۔

Question: ay day aay kay liye aap daytasyt ko pandaas dayta frym main kesay lwda karty hayn؟
Answer: ay day aay kay liye daytasyt ko pandaas dayta frym main lwda karnay kay l you ، aap pandaas laibryry ka ryda_ sy ays wy () tarykha astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: ampwrt pandaas ko PD kay tawr par astamal karty hoey pandaas laibryry draamd kryn۔ daytasyt ko dayta frym main prahnay kay liye prahnay kay liye prahynA dataframedf = pd.read_csv ('dataset.csv')# rzalt prnt (DF) dasplay karain yeh kwda arf PD ka astamal karty hoey pandaas laibryry ko draamd krta haay۔as kay bad yeh CSV fail sy daytasyt prahnay kay liye ryda_ sy ays wy () ka tarykha astamal krta hay jsay daytasyt sy ays wy ko dayta frym main kaha jata haay۔ntyjay main dayta frym ayk mtghyr main mhafwza kya jata hay jsay day ayf kehty hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt daytasyt kay mshmwlat ko tyblr farmyt main hawghy۔ nwt karain keh aap pandaas laibryry kay dusray tarykwn ko dusray fail farmyts ، jesay ayksl ، ays kyw ayl dayta bys ، aur bohat kuch prahnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔aap aadad wa shmar ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay hayda () dayta frym ki pehli chnd ktaaryn zaahar karnay aur aadad wa shmar kay khlasaay kay aadadwshmar haasal karnay kay liye ())۔

Question: aap dayta frym kay tawl wa arzu (ktaar aur kalm) ko kis tarah chyk karty hayn؟
Answer: azaghr main dayta frym kay tawl wa arzu (ktaar aur kalm) ki janch pratal kay l you ، aap dayta frym ki shkl wsaf astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan akdamat hayn: pandaas laibryry kay ryda_ sy ays wy () tarykha ka astamal karty hoey daytasyt ko dayta frym main lwda kryn۔ dayta frym kay tawl wa arzu ko haasal karnay kay liye dayta frym ki shkl wsaf ka astamal kryn۔PDAS btawr PD# daytasyt ko dayta frymdaf = PD.READ_CSV ('dataset.csv') main lwda kryn# dayta fymrwza ، kalm = df.shape# kay tawl wa arzu haasal kryn# ntaij prnt ('ktaar ki tadad:' ، ktaar) prnt karain ('، ktaar) prnt karain (' ، ktaar ki tadad: '، ktaar) prnt kryn'kalmwn ki tadad:' ، kalm) yeh kwda arf PD ka astamal karty hoey pandaas laibryry ko draamd krta haay۔as kay bad yeh CSV fail sy daytasyt prahnay kay liye ryda_ sy ays wy () ka tarykha astamal krta hay jsay daytasyt sy ays wy ko dayta frym main kaha jata haay۔dayta frym ki shkl wsaf dayta frym kay tawl wa arzu ko haasal karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo ktaar aur kalm namy mtghyrat main mhafwza hawtay hayn۔aakhr main ، ntyjay main tawl wa arzu prnt () fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey dkhaiay jatay hayn۔as kwda ki aaؤt pt yeh hawghy: ktaar ki tadad: kalmwn ki 1000 nmbr: 5 nwt keh aap kesi bhi dayta frym ko pandawn main shkl wsaf ka astamal karty hoey dayta frym kay tawl wa arzu ki janch karnay kay liye astamal krsktay hayn۔aap dayta ko jwra twra aur tjzayha karnay kay liye syryza aur dayta frym klas kay mkhtlf dyghr tarykwn aur afaal ka astamal bhi krsktay hain ، jesay hayda () dayta frym ki pehli chnd ktaaryn zaahar karnay aur aadad wa shmar kay khlasaay kay aadadwshmar haasal karnay kay liye ()

Question: aap kesi mtghyr mtghyr ki tksym ko dykhnay kay liye bar chart kesay bnatay hayn؟
Answer: ayk bar chart ayk aam mtghyr ki tksym ko dykhnay ka ayk aam tarykha haay۔slakhyn yksan tawr par fasalha aur yksan tawr par chwray hawty hain ، aur hr bar mtghyr kay zamray ki nmaindghy krta haay۔har bar ki lmbaiy isi zamray 123456 ki tadd ya ghnty kay mtnasb haay۔ azaghr main ، mytplwtlyb laibryry ko bar chart bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔mytplwtlyb ka astamal karty hoey bar chart bnanay ka tarykha yeh hay keh PLT# kay tawr par Pythonimport matplotlib.pyplot kay tawr pr# zamray aur un ki ghnty ki drjha bndy ki wzuahat karain = ['a' ، 'b' ، 'c' ، 'd'] ghnty = [10 ، 20 ، 20، 15 ، 5]# bar chartplt bar (zamrha jat ، ghnty) bnaiyn# lybl aur taitl py ayl ty ayks lybl ('zamrha') plt.ilabel ('ghnty') plt.title shaml karain ('zamrha jat ki tksym')# dkhaiynplatplt shw () yeh kwda ayk bar chart bnata hay js main char ksmwn ('A' ، 'B' ، 'C' ، 'D') aur un ki isi tarah ki ghnty (10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 5) hawty haay۔PLT.BAR () fnkshn bar chart bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur plt.xlabel () ، plt.ilabel () ، aur plt.title () afaal chart main lybl aur ayk anwan shaml karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔aakhr main ، plt.show () fnkshn chart 4.in R ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، GGPLOT2 pykyj ko bar chart bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yhaan jy jy py ayl aw ty 2 ka astamal karty hoey bar chart bnanay kay tarykha ki ayk msaal haay: rbyry yeh kwda char ksmwn ('a' ، 'b' ، 'c' ، 'kay sath ayk bar chart tshkyl dyta haay۔d ') aur un ki mtalkha ghnty (10 ، 20 ، 15 ، 5)۔jy jy py ayl aw ty () fnkshn plat bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur jym_br () fnkshn ko slakhwn ko bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔lybza () fnkshn ka astamal chart 6.1 anfyryntl tnngh 2chartyw 3uiowa4thinkingneuronneuron5pydata6bookdown main lybl aur ayk anwan shaml karnay kay liye kya jata hay

Question: aap mkhtlf ksm kay mtghyr main mkhtlf zamrwn kay tnasb ko dykhnay kay liye paiy chart kesay bnatay hayn؟
Answer: ayk mtghyr mtghyr main mkhtlf zamrwn kay tnasb ko dykhnay kay liye ayk paiy chart bnanay kay l we ، hum azaghr main mytplwtlyb laibryry ka astamal krsktay hayn۔mytplwtlyb 123 ka astamal karty hoey paiy chart bnanay ka tarykha yeh hay keh Plthonimport matplotlib.pyplot kay tawr par Plt# zamray aur un kay tnasb ki drjha bndy ki wzuahat karain = ['a' ، 'b' ، 'c' ، 'd'] tnasb = [0.25 ، 0.35.A '،' B '،' C '،' D ') aur un kay isi tnasb (0.25 ، 0.35 ، 0.2 ، 0.2)۔PIE chart bnanay kay liye PLT.Pie () fnkshn ka astamal kya jata hay ، aur lybl dlyl chart main lybl shaml karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔chart main anwan shaml karnay kay liye plt.title () fnkshn ka astamal kya jata haay۔aakhr main ، plt.show () fnkshn chart ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ lybl dlyl kay alawha ، aatw py sy ty dlyl chart main hr zamray ki fysad ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal ki jaskty haay۔yhaan fysad kay sath paiy chart bnanay ka tarykha is ki ayk msaal haay: Pythonimport matplotlib.pyplot as plt# zamray aur un kay tnasb ki drjha bndy ki wzuahat karain = ['a' ، 'b' ، 'c' ، 'd'] tnasb = [0.25 ، 0.35 ، 0.25 ، 0.35.kwda char ksmwn ('A' ، 'B' ، 'C' ، 'D') aur un kay mtalkha tnasb (0.25 ، 0.35 ، 0.2 ، 0.2) kay sath ayk paiy chart tyar krta haay۔aatw py sy ty dlyl chart main hr zamray ki fysad ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal ki jati haay۔٪ 1.1F ٪٪ farmyt strngh ki wzuahat krty hay keh fysad ko ayk aasharyha jghha kay sath dkhaya jana chahaiay۔baky kwda pchhly msaal ki tarah hi haay۔

Question: aap do addy mtghyr kay mabyn talkat ko dykhnay kay liye skrytr plat kesay bnatay hayn؟
Answer: ayk bkhrnay wala plat do addy mtghyr kay mabyn talkat ko tsawr karnay ka ayk mfyd tarykha haay۔bkhrnay wala plat bnanay kay l we ، hum afky mhawr par ayk mtghyr ki akdar aur amwdy mhawr par dusray mtghyr ki akdar ko plat karty hayn۔plat par hr nktaha do mtghyrat 12345.in azaghr kay liye akdar ki ayk jwray ki nmaindghy krta hay ، hum bkhray hoey plat ko bnanay kay liye mytplwtlyb laibryry ka astamal krsktay hayn۔mytplwtlyb ka astamal karty hoey skrytr plat bnanay kay tarykwn ki ayk msaal yeh haay: paiythwnympwrt mytplwtlyb۔ pyplwt kay tawr par PLT# do mtghyrat ki akdar ki wzuahat karain = [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] y = [2 ، 4 ، 1 ، 1 ، 3 ، 3 ،5]# skrytr platplt۔ askytr (x ، y) bnaiynplatplt۔ shw () yeh kwda panch dayta pwaints kay sath skrytr plat tyar krta haay۔plt.scatter () fnkshn bkhrnay waly plat ko bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur plt.xlabel () ، plt.ilabel () ، aur plt.title () afaal chart main lybl aur ayk anwan shaml karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔aakhr main ، plt.show () fnkshn chart ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yhaan jy jy py ayl aw ty 2 ka astamal karty hoey bkhray hoey plat ko bnanay kay tarykha ki ayk msaal haay: rlibrary (ggplot2)# do mtghyrat ki akdar ki wzuahat karain <- c (1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5) y <- C (2 ، 4 ، 1 ،3 ، 5)# dayta frymf <- data.frame (x = x ، y = y) bnaiyn# bkhray hoey platghplwt (DF ، aes (x = x ، y = y)) + jym_pwaint () + lybza (x lybza (x lybza bnaiyn= 'x mtghyr' ، y = 'y mtghyr' ، anwan = 'dw mtghyr kay mabyn talkat') yeh kwda panch dayta pwaints kay sath ayk bkhray hoey plat ki tshkyl krta haay۔jy jy py ayl aw ty () fnkshn plat bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur jywm_pwaint () fnkshn pwaints bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔lybza () fnkshn ko chart main lybl aur anwan shaml karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔

Question: aap wkt kay sath addy mtghyr kay rjhaan ko dykhnay kay liye lain plat kesay bnatay hayn؟
Answer: wkt kay sath addy mtghyr kay rjhaan ko dykhnay kay l a ayk lain plat bnanay kay l we ، hum azaghr main mytplwtlyb laibryry ya R.in Python main GGPlot2 pykyj ka astamal krsktay hain ، hum ayk lain plat bnanay kay liye mytplwtlyb laibryry ka astamal krsktay hayn۔mytplwtlyb ka astamal karty hoey lain plat bnanay ka tarykha yeh hay keh Plt# kay tawr par Pythonimport matplotlib.pyplot taim ayks kay mkablay main mtghyr ki akdar ki wzuahat karain = [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5] y = [2 ، 4 ، 1 ، 3.platplt shw () dkhaiyn۔ yeh kwda panch dayta pwaints kay sath ayk lain plat tyar krta haay۔plt.plot () fnkshn lain plat bnanay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، aur plt.xlabel () ، plt.ilabel () ، aur plt.title () afaal chart main lybl aur anwan shaml karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔aakhr main ، plt.show () fnkshn chart daat un R ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، hum lain plat bnanay kay liye GGPLOT2 pykyj ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan jy jy py ayl aw ty 2 ka astamal karty hoey lain plat bnanay kay tarykha ki ayk msaal haay: rbryry (jy jy py ayl aw ty 2)# taim ayks <- sy (1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5) Y <- C (2 ، 4 ، 1 kay mkablay main mtghyr ki akdar ki wzuahat kryn۔، 3 ، 5)# dayta frymf <- data.frame (wkt = x ، mtghyr = Y) bnaiyn# lain platghghlwt (DF ، AES (x = wkt ، y = mtghyr)) + jym_lain () + lybza () + lybza bnaiyn (x = 'wkt' ، y = 'mtghyr' ، anwan = 'wkt kay sath sath ayk addy mtghyr ka rjhaan') yeh kwda panch dayta pwaints kay sath ayk lain plat tshkyl dyta haay۔jy jy py ayl aw ty () fnkshn plat bnanay kay liye astamal hawta hay ، aur jym_lain () fnkshn lain bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔lybza () fnkshn ka astamal chart main lybl aur ayk anwan shaml karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔

Question: mtadd addy mtghyr kay mabyn artbata ko dykhnay kay l you aap ghrmy ka nkshha kesay bnatay hayn؟
Answer: mtadd addy mtghyr kay mabyn artbata ko dykhnay kay liye hayt myp bnanay kay l we ، hum azaghr main smndry bwrn laibryry ka astamal krsktay hayn۔artbata hayt myp 123456 bnanay kay liye amwmy akdamat yeh hayn: mtalwbha laibryrywn ko draamd kryn: pandaas ، mytplwtlyb ، aur smndry bwrn۔ dayta ko ayk pandaas dayta fym main lwda kryn۔hayt myp () smndry bwrn laibryry ka fnkshn ، bahamy rabtaay kay mytrks ko dayta kay tawr par mntkl karty hoey hayt myp () fnkshn kay mkhtlf pyramytrza ka astamal karty hoey mtalwbha hayt myp ko astamal kryn۔ smndry shkl ka astamal karty hoey artbata hayt myp bnanay ka tarykha: PDIMPORT kay tawr par paiytwnympwrt pandaas ka astamal karty hoey ayk msaal haay۔matplotlib.pyplot as pltimport smndry bwrn kay tawr par SNS# dayta ko dataframedf = pd.read_csv ('data.csv') main lwda kryn# artbata mytrkskwr_mytrks = df.corre ()# hayt mypsn ays. bnaiyn۔anwan ('artbata hayt myp')# platplt shw () dkhaiyn۔PD.read_csv () fnkshn dayta ko dayta frym main lwda karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur dayta frym ka CORR () tarykha artbata mytrks ki ghnty kay liye astamal hawta haay۔sns.heatmap () fnkshn ko hayt myp bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، aur chart main anwan shaml karnay kay liye plt.title () fnkshn ka astamal kya jata haay۔aakhr main ، plt.show () fnkshn chart ko zaahar karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ hayt myp () fnkshn main bohat sy pyramytrza hain jo hayt myp ki zaahary shkl ko apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnanay kay liye astamal hawsktay hain ، jesay rngh skym ko tbdyl karna ، tshryhaat shaml karna ، aur saiza ko aydajst karna ،awr plat ka fasalha

Question: ay day aay kay doran aap addy kalm main aaؤt lyirza ko kis tarah snbhaltay aur tsawr karty hayn؟
Answer: ay day aay kay doran ، addy kalm main aaؤt lyirza ko snbhalna aur tsawr karna ayk aham kdm hay takha aadad wa shmar kay mayar ko ykyny bnaya jaskay aur is sy tyar krdha bsayrt ki drstghy ko ykyny bnaya jaskay۔ayk addy kalm main aaؤt lyirza ko snbhalnay aur tsawr karnay kay liye kuch amwmy akdamat yeh hayn: hastwghram ، baks plat ، ya ksaaft kay plat ka astamal karty hoey addy kalm ki tksym ko kesi bhi aaؤt lyir ki nshandhay karnay kay liye tsawr kryn۔aadad wa shmar ki nwayt aur tjzayha kay ahadaf ki bnyad par aaؤt lyirza ko kis tarah snbhalnay ka tarykha haay۔kchh aam tarykwn main aaؤt lyirza ko hatana ، dayta ko tbdyl karna ، ya aaؤt lyirza ko ayk alyhadha zamrha kay tawr par alaj karna shaml hayn۔ aaؤt lyirza ko snbhalnay kay bad dwbarha aadad wa shmar ko dykhyn۔ is bat ka ykyn karnay kay liye keh tksym bnyady aadad wa shmar ka zayada nmaindha haay۔aaؤt lyirza ko dykhnay kay liye afaal ، jesay baks plat () aur wayln plt ()۔mytplwtlyb laibryry ko hastghrams aur ksaaft kay plat bnanay kay liye bhi astamal kya jaskta haay۔aar main ، jy jy py ayl aw ty 2 pykyj aaؤt lyirza ko dykhnay kay l similar isi tarah kay afaal mhaya krta hay ، jesay jywm_baksplwt () aur jywm_daynsty ()۔aadadwshmar kay pykyj ko aadadwshmar kay tarykwn jesay IQR aur Z-SCORE ko anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh aaؤt lyirza ko snbhalna ahatyata sy aur aadad wa shmar ki nwayt aur tjzayha kay ahadaf par ghwr karnay kay sath kya jana chahaiay۔aaؤt lyirza main kymty malwmat shaml hawskty hain aur jwaza kay baghair inhain hatana mtasab ntaij ka baasa bn sakta haay۔lhazaa ، is kay pychhay hayndalngh aur is kay pychhay astdlal ki dstawyza karna zurwry haay۔

Question: ay day aay kay doran aap kis tarah dayta ki askych ka ptha lghatay hain aur un ko snbhaltay hayn؟
Answer: ay day aay kay doran dayta askywyns ko snbhalna aur is ka tsawr karna ayk aham akdam hay takha aadad wa shmar kay mayar aur is sy haasal krdha bsayrt ki drstghy ko ykyny bnaya jaskay۔ay day aay kay doran dayta askywyns ka ptha lghanay aur un ko snbhalnay kay liye kuch amwmy akdamat yeh hayn: kesi bhi skwins ki nshandhay karnay kay liye hastwghram ، baks plat ، ya ksaaft plat ka astamal karty hoey addy kalm ki tksym ka tsawr kryn۔askychda tksym ya tou baien ya dien taraf mskh hawty hay ، aur askaiyns ghair tsly ka pymanha haay۔ayk aam tksym main 0. astamal kay aadadwshmar kay tarykwn jesay antrwkytail rynj (IQR) ya Z-askwr jesay addy kalm main askywyns ka ptha lghanay kay liye askychys hawty haay۔askywyns mfrwzuha main kaha gaya hay keh aadad wa shmar main ayk twazan ya mtwazan tksym hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh mtalb ، mydayn aur mwda ayk dusray kay brabr ya kryb hayn۔tjzayha.kchh aam tarykwn main lagh un tbdyly ، mrba rwt transfarmyshn ، ya baks kwks transfarmyshn jesay tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey aadad wa shmar ko tbdyl karna shaml haay۔ askywins ko snbhalnay kay bad dwbarha aadad wa shmar ko bnaiyn۔laibryry askywyns ko dykhnay kay l useful mfyd afaal mhaya krty hay ، jesay dastrkt () aur baks plat ()۔mytplwtlyb laibryry ko hastghrams aur ksaaft kay plat bnanay kay liye bhi astamal kya jaskta haay۔R main ، GGPLOT2 pykyj askywins ko dykhnay kay liye isi tarah kay afaal fraham krta hay ، jesay jywm_hastghram () aur jywm_daynsty ()۔aadadwshmar kay pykyj ko aadadwshmar kay tarykwn jesay IQR aur Z-Score ko anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh askych ko snbhalna ahatyata sy aur aadad wa shmar ki nwayt aur tjzayha kay ahadaf par ghwr karnay kay sath kya jana chahaiay۔askyda dayta main kymty malwmat shaml hawskty hain aur jwaza kay baghair isy tbdyl karna mtasab ntaij ka baasa bn sakta haay۔lhazaa ، is kay pychhay hayndalngh aur is kay pychhay astdlal ki dstawyza karna zurwry haay۔

Question: ay day aay kay doran aap aaly kardanlty kay sath zamrha dar mtghyrat ko kis tarah snbhaltay aur tsawr karty hayn؟

Question: ay day aay kay doran aap fychr askylngh aur narmlaizayshn kis tarah anjam dytay hayn؟

Question: ay day aay kay doran aap addy mtghyr kay mabyn ksayr alkwmyt ka ptha lghanay aur kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟
Answer: ay day aay kay doran addy mtghyrat kay mabyn mlty klyiryty ka ptha lghana aur un sy nmtna aadad wa shmar kay mayar aur is sy haasal krdha bsayrt ki drstghy ko ykyny bnanay kay liye ayk aham akdam haay۔ksayr aljhaty is wkt hawta hay jab rjat psndy kay madal main do ya zayada aazaad mtghyrat anthaaiy had tak bahamy talk rkhtay hain ، jo rjat kay zuwabta kay ghair msthakm aur nakabl aatmad () aur jywm_tail ()۔kar pykyj ko aadadwshmar kay tarykwn jesay VIF aur haalt nmbr ko anjam denay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh mlty swly lainryty ko snbhalna ahatyata Question: ay day aay kay doran aap tykst dayta ko kis tarah snbhaltay aur tsawr karty hayn؟
Answer: ay day aay kay doran tykst dayta ko snbhalnay aur dykhnay main kiy akdamat shaml hayn۔ay day aay kay doran tykst dayta ko snbhalnay aur tsawr karnay kay liye kuch amwmy akdamat yeh hayn: tykst dayta ko mnasb dayta dahanchay main lwda karain ، jesay pandaas dayta frym ya dawr ki fharst۔ astap alfaza ، awkaf aur dyghr ghair mtalkha malwmat ko hata kar tykst dayta ko pysh kryn۔twknaizayshn ، astymngh ، aur lymmytaizayshn jesi tknykwn ka astamal۔ mtn kay aadad wa shmar ko aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn aur rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye wrda klaؤdaza ، frykwynsy platwn ، aur tapk madalngh jesi tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey mtn kay aadad wa shmar ko astamal kryn۔ bygh aaf wrdaza jesay tykst dayta ka astamal karty hoey tykst dayta ko ankwda kryn۔، asatalaha frykwynsy-andarwrs dstawyza frykwinsy (TF-IDF) ، aur mtn kay aadad wa shmar ko addy aadad wa shmar main tbdyl karnay kay liye lfza aymbydanghza jo mshyn lrnngh madal main astamal ki jaskty hayn۔ aadadwshmar kay tarykwn jesay klstrngh aur ankwdada tykst dayta main drjha bndy ko ankwdada tykst dayta main drjha bndy karna aur ankwdada tykst dayta ko drjha bndy karna awrpyshn ghwiy kryn۔ azaghr main ، NLTK laibryry mtn pry prwsysngh kay l useful mfyd afaal mhaya krty hay ، jesay wrda_twkynaiza () ، pwrtstymr () ، aur wrdanyt lymmytaizar ()۔Sklearn.feature_extraction.text madaywl tykst ankwdangh kay liye mfyd afaal fraham krta hay ، jesay kaؤnt wyktraizar () ، TFIDFVectorizer () ، aur wrda 2 wy ay sy ()۔jynsym laibryry tapk madalngh kay liye mfyd afaal mhaya krty hay ، jesay ldaamwdayl () aur ayl ays aai aym aw day ay ayl ()۔R main ، TM pykyj tykst pry prwsysngh kay l similar isi tarah kay afaal fraham krta hay ، jesay TM_MAP () aur astym dawkywmnt ()۔tykst 2 wy ay sy pykyj tykst ankwdangh kay l useful mfyd Question: ay day aay kay doran aap py sy aay jesi jhaty kami ki tknyk kesay anjam dytay hayn؟
Answer: ay day aay kay doran py sy aay jesay tawl wa arzu main kami ki tknyk ko anjam denay main mndrjha zayl akdamat shaml hayn: aadad wa shmar ko mnasb dayta dahanchay main lwda karain ، jesay pandaas dayta frym ya ayk npy srny۔ addy mtghyr ki nshandhay karain jsay aap py sy aay tjzayha main shaml karna chahti hayn۔ addy mtghyrat ko askyl kryn۔ksy mnasb tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ، jesay mayary ya mn myks askylngh ، is bat ko ykyny bnanay kay liye keh woh ayk hi pymanay par hayn۔ py sy aay alghwrthm ko dayta ki jhat ko kam karnay kay liye askylda addy mtghyr par lghaiyn۔ tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey py sy aay tjzayha kay ntaij ko dkhaiyn۔jysay aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn aur rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye bkhrnay waly platwn ya baipplwts ، asklrn daat kampwzayshn madaywl py sy aay ko anjam denay kay l useful mfyd afaal fraham krta hay ، jesay py sy aay ()۔asklrn۔ pryprwsysngh madaywl addy mtghyrat ko askyl karnay kay liye mfyd afaal fraham krta hay ، jesay astyndardars askylr () aur mn myks askylr ()۔R main ، aadadwshmar ka pykyj py sy aay ko anjam denay kay liye isi tarah kay afaal fraham krta hay ، jesay PRCOMP () aur prnsmp ()۔askyl () fnkshn ko addy mtghyrat ko askyl karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh addy mtghyr ko askyl karnay kay tarykha kar ka antkhab ahatyata sy aur aadad wa shmar ki nwayt aur tjzayha kay ahadaf par ghwr karnay kay sath kya jana chahaiay۔mkhtlf tarykwn sy aadad wa shmar par mkhtlf asarat pra saktay hain aur mkhtlf ntaij ka baasa bn saktay hayn۔lhazaa ، addy mtghyrat aur is kay pychhay astdlal ko askyl karnay kay liye astamal hony waly tarykha kar ki dstawyza karna zurwry haay۔mzayd braan ، py sy aay tjzayha kay ntaij ko ahatyata sy aur aadad wa shmar ki nwayt aur tjzayha kay ahadaf par ghwr karnay kay sath yeh zurwry haay۔py sy aay main kymty malwmat shaml hawskty hain aur jwaza kay baghair is ki trjmany mtasab ntaij ka baasa bn sakti haay۔lhazaa ، py sy aay tjzayha ki tshryha aur is kay pychhay astdlal ki dstawyza karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap baks platwn ya wayln platwn ka astamal karty hoey mkhtlf ghrwpwn main addy mtghyr ki tksym ka tjzayha kesay karty hayn؟
Answer: baks plat aur wayln plat mkhtlf ghrwhawn main addy mtghyr ki tksym ka tjzayha karnay kay liye mfyd twlza hayn۔baks platwn ya wayln platwn ka astamal karty hoey addy mtghyr ki tksym ka tjzayha karnay kay liye yahan amwmy akdamat hayn: aadad wa shmar ko mnasb dayta dahanchay main lwda karain ، jesay pandaas dayta frym ya ayk npy srny۔ addy mtghyr aur is mtghyr mtghyr ki nshandhay karain jo aap chahti hayn۔tjzayha main shaml karnay kay l .۔ ayk baks plat ya wayln plat tyar karain jo wazuha mtghyr ki mkhtlf aksam main addy mtghyr ki tksym ko tsawr karnay kay liye tsawr kryn۔ baks plat ya wayln plat ki antrypryt karain mydayn ، kwartailza ، aur shnakht karnay kay liye aaؤt lyirza ki janch krkaymtghyr mtghyr ki mkhtlf aksam main addy mtghyr ki tksym main koi bhi nmwnha ya rjhaanat۔ baks plat aur wayln plat ayk jesay hain keh woh dono ayk mtghyr mtghyr ki mkhtlf ksmwn main addy mtghyr ki tksym ko zaahar karty hayn۔taham ، wayln plat tksym ki ksaaft kay baray main mazeed malwmat fraham karty hain ، jabky baks plat kwartailza aur aaؤt lyirza kay baray main mazeed malwmat fraham karty hayn۔lhazaa ، baks plat aur wayln plat kay mabyn antkhab ka anhasaar aadad wa shmar ki nwayt aur tjzayha kay ahadaf par hawta haay۔ azaghr main ، smndry bwrn laibryry baks platwn aur wayln platwn ، jesay baks plat () aur wayln plwt bnanay kay liye mfyd afaal fraham krty haay۔().mytplwtlyb laibryry ko baks platwn aur wayln platwn ko bnanay kay liye bhi astamal kya jaskta haay۔R main ، GGPLOT2 pykyj baks platwn aur wayln platwn ko bnanay kay liye isi tarah kay afaal mhaya krta hay ، jesay jywm_baksplwt () aur jywm_wywln ()aadad wa shmar ki nwayt aur tjzayha kay ahadaf۔mkhtlf mtghyr ki tksym main mkhtlf nmwnwn ya rjhaanat ki mkhtlf ksm kay mtghyr ki tksym main tjzayha kay l different mkhtlf mzumrat hawsktay hayn۔lhazaa ، baks plat ya wayln plat ki tshryha aur is kay pychhay astdlal ki dstawyza karna zurwry haay۔

Question: ay day aay kay doran aap taim syryza kay dayta ko kis tarah snbhaltay aur tsawr karty hayn؟
Answer: ay day aay kay doran taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar ko snbhalnay aur dykhnay main kiy akdamat shaml hayn۔ay day aay kay doran taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar ko snbhalnay aur tsawr karnay kay liye kuch amwmy akdamat yeh hayn: taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar ko mnasb dayta dahanchay main lwda karain ، jesay pandaas dayta frym ya ayk nmy srny۔ dayta ko mnasb laibryry ya pykyj ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza ki shkl main tbdyl kryn۔، jesay pandaas ya nympy۔ taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar ko dayta main nmwnwn aur rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye lain platwn ، bkhrnay waly platwn ، aur hayt myp jesi tknyk ka astamal karty hoey taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar ko dykhyn۔ aadad wa shmar kay tarykwn jesay khwdkshy ، kras artbata ، aur taim syryza ki srany jesay haasal kryn۔aadad wa shmar astamal kryn۔ pandaas laibryry taim syryza ko snbhalnay aur dykhnay kay liye mfyd afaal fraham krty haay۔dayta ، jesay ryda_ sy ays wy () ، tw_dayt taim () ، aur plat ()۔astyts mwdal laibryry ko aadadwshmar kay tarykwn jesay khud kshy aur wkt ki syryza ki sranay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔SKLERN.Decomposition madaywl PCA aur T-SNE anjam denay kay liye mfyd afaal fraham krta haay۔R main ، XTS pykyj taim syryza kay aadad wa shmar ko snbhalnay aur dykhnay kay l similar isi tarah kay afaal fraham krta hay ، jesay Read.zoo () aur plat.zaw ()۔pyshn ghwiy pykyj ko aadad wa shmar kay Question: ay day aay kay doran aap daplykyt akdar ki shnakht aur hayndal kesay karty hayn؟
Answer: ay day aay kay doran daplykyt akdar ki nshandhay karna aur un sy nmtna is sy haasal krdha aadad wa shmar kay mayar aur bsayrt ki drstghy ko ykyny bnanay kay liye ayk aham akdam haay۔ay day aay kay doran daplykyt akdar ki nshandhay karnay aur un ko snbhalnay kay liye kuch amwmy akdamat yeh hayn: daytasyt main daplykyt akdar ki janch karain ، khasa tawr par klydy kalmwn main jn main anwkhy akdar honi chahaiyn۔ mnasb tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey daplykyt akdar ki nshandhay karain ، jesay pandawn main daplykytda () tarykha kar۔ya numpy.decide main anwkha () tarykha js main aadad wa shmar ki nwayt aur tjzayha kay ahadaf ki bnyad par daplykyt akdar ko kis tarah snbhalna haay۔kchh aam tarykwn main daplykyt akdar ko hatana ، daplykyt akdar ki pehli mwjwdghy ko brkrar rkhna ، ya daplykyt akdar ki aakhry mwjwdghy ko rkhna shaml haay۔ mnasb tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey daplykyt akdar ko tbdyl karain ya is main trmym karain ، jesay pandawn main darap_ dawplykyts () tarykha yanumpy.in azaghr main mnfrd () tarykha ، pandaas laibryry daplykyt akdar ki nshandhay karnay aur un sy nmtnay kay l useful mfyd afaal mhaya krty hay ، jesay daplykyt () ، darap_dawplykyts () ، aur mnfrd ()۔nmy laibryry ko mnfrd () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey daplykyt akdar ki nshandhay karnay kay liye bhi astamal kya jaskta haay۔R main ، DPLER pykyj daplykyt akdar ki nshandhay karnay aur un sy nmtnay kay liye isi tarah kay afaal fraham krta hay ، jesay alag alag () aur nkl ()tjzayha kay ahadaf۔daplykyt akdar main kymty malwmat shaml hawskty hain aur jwaza kay baghair un ko snbhalna mtasab ntaij ka baasa bn sakta haay۔lhazaa ، is kay pychhay daplykyt akdar ki hayndalngh aur is kay pychhay astdlal ki dstawyza karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap skrytr mytrks platwn ya jwray kay platwn ka astamal karty hoey mtadd mtghyrat kay mabyn talkat ka tjzayha aur tsawr kesay karty hayn؟
Answer: skrytr mytrks plat ، jsay jwray kay plat bhi kaha jata hay ، mtadd mtghyrat kay mabyn talkat ka tjzayha aur tsawr karnay kay liye mfyd twlza hayn۔skrytr mytrks platwn ya jwray kay platwn ka astamal karty hoey mtadd mtghyrat kay mabyn talkat ka tjzayha karnay aur tsawr karnay kay liye amwmy akdamat yeh hayn: dayta ko mnasb dayta dahanchay main lwda karain ، jesay pandaas dayta frym ya ayk nmy srny۔ addy mtghyr ko mntkhb karain js main aap shaml karna chahti hayn۔skrytr mytrks plat ya jwray kay plat myn۔ skrytr mytrks plat ya jwray plat bnanay kay liye pandaas sy skrytr_mytrks () fnkshn ka astamal kryn۔skrytr platwn ki janch pratal karna aur addy mtghyrat kay mabyn talkat main kesi bhi nmwnwn ya rjhaanat ki nshandhay krna۔ pandaas۔ plwtngh madaywl skrytr mytrks platwn ko bnanay kay liye mfyd afaal fraham krta hay ، jesay skrytr_mtrks ()۔smndry bwrn laibryry jwray kay platwn ، jesay jwraay kay plat () bnanay kay liye mfyd afaal mhaya krty haay۔aar main ، jy jy py ayl aw ty 2 pykyj skrytr mytrks platwn aur jwray kay platwn ko bnanay kay liye isi tarah kay afaal fraham krta hay ، jesay jy jy pyirza ()۔ skrytr mytrks plat ya jwray kay plat ki trjmany karnay main skrytr platwn ki janch karna aur addy mtghyrat kay mabyn talkat main kesi bhi nmwnwn ya rjhaanat ki nshandhay karna shaml haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، agar do mtghyrat kay mabyn mzubwta msabt artbata hay tou ، bkhray hoey plat nchlay baien sy awpry dien tak akhtrn lain dkhaiay gha۔aghr koi mzubwta mnfy artbata hay tou ، skrytr plat awpry baien sy nechay dien tak akhtrn lain dkhaiay gha۔aghr koi artbata nahin hay tou ، bkhray hoey plat pwaints ka bay trtyb bkhrnay ka mzaaharha karain ghay۔skrytr mytrks plat ya jwray kay plat main bkhray hoey platwn ki janch krkay ، hum addy mtghyr kay mabyn talkat kay baray main bsayrt haasal krsktay hayn۔

Answer: do dwtwk mtghyr kay mabyn talkat ka tjzayha aur tsawr karna hanghamy jdwlwn ya astykda bar platwn ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔hanghamy jdwlwn ya astykda bar platwn ka astamal karty Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main aan lain ashthaar mham ka dayta hawta haay۔mwsar hadf sazay ki hakmt amlywn ki nshandhay krkay aap AD ki karkrdghy ka tjzayha aur un ko kis tarah bhatr bnaiyn ghay؟
Answer: aan lain ashthaary mham kay aadad wa shmar par mushtamil daytasyt main mwsar hadf sazay ki hakmt amlywn ki nshandhay krkay AD ki karkrdghy ka tjzayha aur un ki asalaha kay l you ، aap un aam akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: kesi bhi ghair mtalkha malwmat ko hatanay aur dayta ko kesi mnasb dahanchay main farmyt krkay dayta ko pehlay sy tyar karain ، jesay pandaas dayta frym۔ashthaar ki karkrdghy kay baray main aadad wa shmar ko aktha karnay aur tjzayha karnay kay liye AD mham ki asalaha kay twlza ka astamal karain aur klydy mytrks ki nshandhay karain jo AD ko nshanha bnanay ki hakmt amlywn ko byan karty hain ، jesay samayn kay tarza aml ، chynl ki antsab ، aur mysjngh kwaardaynyshn۔ kesi bhi nmwnwn ya rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye ashthaary mham ki asalaha kay ntaij ko tjzayha kryn۔aadad wa shmar jo mwsar hadf sazay ki hakmt amlywn ki nshandhay krsktay hayn۔ tjzayha main shnakht shuda kesi bhi hadf kay msail ko hal krkay AD ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnaiyn۔ AD kay mkhtlf antkhaby asalaha kay mkhtlf twlza hain jo AD ki karkrdghy kay baray main dayta aktha karnay aur tjzayha karnay kay liye astamal hawsktay hain ، jesay ghwghl ashthaarat ، fys bk ashthaarat ،awr spr mytrks۔msaal kay tawr par ، nyl ptyl 1 main shaia hony wali ayk thakyk nay ghwghl kay ashthaarat ko khrydar kay sfr main ashthaar ki hakmt amly ko sydh main krkay aur pori mham kay doran mshghwl mydaya ki mtadd shklwn ka astamal karty hoey ashthaar ki mhamwn ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya۔ ashthaar ki mham kay ntaij ko tjzayha karnay main klydy mytrks ki nshandhay karna shaml hay jo ashthaar ko nshanha bnana byan karty hayn۔hakmt amly ، jesay samayn ka tarza aml ، chynl antsab ، aur pygham rsany kwaardaynyshn۔tjzayha kay ntaij ki janch pratal krkay ، hum ahadaf ki mwsar hakmt amlywn kay baray main bsayrt haasal krsktay hain jo AD ki karkrdghy ko mtasar krsktay hayn۔ yeh bat aham hay keh ntaij ki trjmany ahatyata sy aur aadad wa shmar ki nwayt aur ahadaf par ghwr karnay kay sath ki jany chahaiay۔tjzayha kaaadad wa shmar main mkhtlf nmwnwn ya rjhaanat kay tjzayha kay liye mkhtlf mzumrat hawsktay hayn۔lhazaa ، ntaij ki tshryha aur is kay pychhay astdlal ki dstawyza karna zurwry haay۔mzayd braan ، tjzayha main nshandhay ki hogi kesi bhi hadf kay msail ko hal krkay AD ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana mjmway AD ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta hay aur AD ROI2 main azuafha krskta haay۔ kuch mwsar hadf sazay ki hakmt amly jo AD ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hain un main shaml hayn: khrydar kay liye AD ki hakmt amly ko sydh main shaml karna mtadd shklwn ko mshghwl karnay ki mtadd shklwn ka astamal karty hawiay۔mydaya main bhatry kay l individuals alakwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye samayn kay tarza aml ki nshandhay ki jaskty hay takha yeh smjhnay kay liye keh hr chynl un hadf sazay ki hakmt amlywn ka astamal karty hoey hadf aur zaaty nwayt kay ashthaarat aur mysjngh baiy ko pysh karnay kay liye pysh ksh kwaardaynyshn main tryfk chlanay main kis tarah karkrdghy ka mzaaharha krta hay ، karwbar un ki AD ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur un ki ROI.1 Searchengineland2virtusa ko bhatr bna saktay hain

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main prwdakt rywyw dayta hawta haay۔mmknha msanwaat ki taaktwn aur kmzawrywn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aap jzabat ki tksym ka tjzayha aur tsawr kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: msanwa kay jaizaay kay aadad wa shmar par mushtamil daytasyt main mmknha msanwaat ki taaktwn aur kmzawrywn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye jzabat ki tksym ka tjzayha aur tsawr karnay kay l you ، aap un aam akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: kesi bhi ghair mtalkha malwmat ko hatatay hoey aur aadad wa shmar ko mnasb dahanchay main farmas karain ، jesay pandaasdayta frym۔ jaizawn ko msabt ، mnfy ، ya ghair janbdar krar denay kay liye jzabat kay tjzayha ki tknykwn ka astamal kryn۔ jzabat kay tjzayay kay ntaij ko aadad wa shmar main kesi bhi nmwnwn ya rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye tjzayha kay ntaij ko tjzayha karain jo mmknha msanwaat ki taakt aur kmzawrywn ki nshandhay krsktay hayn۔ tjzayha kay ntaij ko zaahar kryn۔aadad wa shmar main kesi bhi nmwnwn ya rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye ghraf ya chart۔ yahan jzabat kay tjzayha ki mkhtlf tknykyn hain jo jaizawn ko msabt ، mnfy ya ghair janbdar ، jesay mshyn lrnngh ki tknyk aur ghair nghrany kay tarykwn ki drjha bndy karnay kay liye astamal ki jaskty hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، wyly aan lain laibryry 1 astamal shuda mshyn lrnngh tknyk main shaia shuda ayk mtaalaha js main mtny khsawsayat ki janch pratal karnay waly khrydarwn kay jaizawn ki drjha bndy ki jaskty haay۔ jzabat kay tjzayay kay ntaij ko tjzayha karnay main aadad wa shmar main kesi bhi nmwnwn ya rjhaanat ki nshandhay karna shaml hay jo mmknha msanwaat ki taakt aur kmzawrywn ki nshandhay krskta haay۔tjzayha kay ntaij ki janch pratal krkay ، hum is msanwa kay un shabwn kay baray main bsayrt haasal krsktay hain jn sy saarfyn bohat zayada mtamin hain aur un alakwn ko jn main bhatry ki zurwrt haay۔ ghraf ya chart ka astamal karty hoey tjzayha kay ntaij ko zaahar karna dayta main kesi bhi nmwnwn ya rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay main mdd krskta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، sab sy braay msilay ki mkdar drst karnay aur is ko trjyha denay kay liye syntysm 2 astamal karnay waly kstmr fyda byk tjzayha main shaia hony wali ayk thakyk۔tjzayha kaaadad wa shmar main mkhtlf nmwnwn ya rjhaanat kay tjzayha kay liye mkhtlf mzumrat hawsktay hayn۔lhazaa ، ntaij ki tshryha aur is kay pychhay astdlal ki dstawyza karna zurwry haay۔mzayd braan ، tjzayha main shnakht shuda kesi bhi msilay ko hal krkay msanwaat ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana saarfyn kay mjmway atamynan ko bhatr bna sakta hay aur msanwaat ki frwkht main azuafha krskta haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main sahat ki dykh bhal kay daway ka dayta hawta haay۔aap dayta mainngh ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey jaly dawؤn kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: sahat ki dykh bhal kay daway kay aadad wa shmar par mushtamil daytasyt main dayta mainngh ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey dhwkha dhay kay dawwn kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur un ki nshandhay karnay kay liye ، aap un aam akdamat par aml krsktay hayn: kesi bhi ghair mtalkha malwmat ko hata kar aur dayta ko kesi mnasb dahanchay main farmyt krkay ، jesay pandaas dayta frym main dayta ko pysh kryn۔sahat ki dykh bhal kay dawwn main dhwkha dhay kay dawwn kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar ki kan kny ki tknyk ، jesay zayr nghrany aur ghair mnkwlha sykhnay ka astamal kryn۔ aadad wa shmar main kesi bhi nmwnwn ya rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye dayta kan kny kay ntaij ko tjzayha karain jo dhwkha dhay kay daway ki nshandhay krsktay hayn۔mstkbl main dhwkha dhay kay dawwn ki nshandhay karnay aur un ko rwknay kay liye madal۔ dayta kan kny ki mkhtlf tknykyn hain jn ka astamal sahat ki dykh bhal kay dawwn kay aadad wa shmar main jaly dawwn kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye kya jaskta hay ، jesay zayr nghrany aur ghair nghrany sykhna۔msaal kay tawr par ، by aym sy mydaykl anfarmytks aur fysalha sazay main shaia hony wali ayk thakyk main antzaamy dayta bys (aych day sy) ka astamal karnay waly asptalwn main jaly dawwn ka ptha lghanay kay liye antzaamy dayta bys kay sath aaؤt lytr ka ptha lghanay kay liye do kdmwn sy ghair mnzam klstrngh kay tarykha kar ka astamal kya ghya۔ dayta ki kan kny kay aadad wa shmar kay ntaij ka ptha lghana۔aadad wa shmar main kesi bhi nmwnwn ya rjhaanat ki nshandhay karna shaml hay jo jaly dawwn ki nshandhay krsktay hayn۔tjzayha kay ntaij ki janch pratal krkay ، hum un nmwnwn ya rjhaanat kay baray main bsayrt haasal krsktay hain jo sahat ki dykh bhal kay dawwn kay aadad wa shmar ko mtasar krsktay hayn۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh ntaij ki tshryha ahatyata sy aur aadad wa shmar ki nwayt aur is par ghwr karnay kay sath ki jany chahaiay۔tjzayha kay ahadaf۔aadad wa shmar main mkhtlf nmwnwn ya rjhaanat kay tjzayha kay liye mkhtlf mzumrat hawsktay hayn۔lhazaa ، ntaij ki tshryha aur is kay pychhay astdlal ki dstawyza karna zurwry haay۔mzayd braan ، mstkbl main dhwkha dhay kay dawwn ki nshandhay karnay aur un ki rwk tham kay liye dhwkha dhay ka ptha lghanay kay madal ki tyary sy sahat ki dykh bhal kay nzaam ki mjmway karkrdghy aur tasayr ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main swshl mydaya par asar andaza hawta haay۔aap un kay mwad kay zamray aur samayn kay aadadwshmar ki bnyad par asar wa rswkh ka tjzayha aur drjha bndy kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: swshl mydaya par mushtamil dayta par mushtamil daytasyt main un kay mwad kay zamray aur samayn kay aadadwshmar ki bnyad par asar andaza karnay walon ka tjzayha aur drjha bndy karnay kay liye ، drjha bndy kay tjzayha kay twlza ko asar andaza karnay waly mwad kay zamray aur samayn kay aadad wa shmar kay baray main dayta aktha karnay aur tjzayha karnay kay liye aur klydy pymaish ki nshandhay karnay waly klydy pymaishwn ki nshandhay karain jo asar andaza karnay waly tabkat ، jesay mwad ki ksm ، samayn kay aadadwshmar ، aur mshghwlyt ki shrhawn ko byan karty hayn۔aadad wa shmar main koi bhi nmwnha ya rjhaanat jo mkhsawsa anflwynsr tabkat ki nshandhay krsktay hayn۔ aadad wa shmar main kesi bhi nmwnwn ya rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye ghraf ya chart ka astamal karty hoey tjzayha kay ntaij ko dkhaiyn aur mkhsawsa asar anghyza tabkat ko nshanha bnaiyn۔ yahan mkhtlf asar anghyza drjha bndy kay tjzayay kay twlza astamal kyay jasktay hayn۔asar andaza karnay waly mwad kay zamray aur samayn kay aadadwshmar ، jesay wlfrm alfa ، sy aym waiyr ، aur harwnwsysl kay baray main dayta aktha karnay aur un ka tjzayha karnay kay liay۔msaal kay tawr par ، sy aym wyir 1 tabkaty asar ko char nwayt par ghwr karnay kay sath ki jany chahaiay۔dayta aur tjzayha kay ahadaf۔aadad wa shmar main mkhtlf nmwnwn ya rjhaanat kay tjzayha kay liye mkhtlf mzumrat hawsktay hayn۔lhazaa ، ntaij ki tshryha Answer: saarfyn ki khrydary ki tarykh kay aadad wa shmar sy mhasawl main azuafay kay liye kras sylngh aur ap sylngh kay mwaka ka tjzayha aur un ki nshandhay karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: khrydary ki tarykh ka dayta aktha kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy khrydary ki tarykh ka dayta aktha karain ، jesay tranzaykshn laghza ، kstmr prwfailza aur rsydyn۔as aadad wa shmar main khrydy hogi msanwaat ya khdmat kay baray main malwmat ، khrydary ki frykwinsy ، aur khrch ki rkm shaml hawskty haay۔ ghahak kay tarza aml ko tjzayha karnay kay liay: kstmr kay tarza aml ka tjzayha karnay aur un ki khrydary ki tarykh main nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye kstmr syghmnttyshn ka astamal kryn۔as sy saarfyn ki trjyhaat aur khrydnay ki aadat 23 par mbny kras sylngh aur ap frwkht kay mwaka ki nshandhay karnay main mdd mil sakti haay۔ tkmyly msanwaat ki nshandhay kryn: aysy msanwaat ya khdmat ki tlash karain jo ghahak kay zaryaha khrydy hogi khdmat kay mtaabk hawn۔msaal kay tawr par ، agar koi saarf lyp tap khrydta hay tou ، woh lyp tap kys ya maؤs 4 ki khrydary main bhi dlchspy la saktay hayn۔ sfarshat par aml pyra hawn: sfarshat aur pysh kshwn ko zaaty nwayt kay liye kstmr dayta ka astamal kryn۔yha saarfyn kay tarza aml ka tjzayha karnay aur un ki khrydary ki tarykh ki bnyad par zaaty nwayt ki sfarshat pysh karnay kay liye mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal krkay kya jaskta haay۔ msanwaat ki jghha ka tayn kryn: tkmyly msanwaat ki nmaish ko brahanay kay liye apni wyb sait ya astwr main msanwaat ki jghha ko bhatr bnaiyn۔yha mtalkha msanwaat ko ayk sath rakh kar ya ghahakwn ko tkmyly msanwaat ko frwgh denay kay liye targhtda aydawrtaizangh ka astamal krkay kya jaskta haay۔mshyn lrnngh۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad dayta zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Answer: sahat ki dykh bhal kay mayar ko bhatr bnanay kay l patients mryzuwn kay sahat kay rykarda main taby alaj aur ntaij kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: mryzuwn ki sahat kay rykarda ko jma kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy mryzuwn ki sahat kay rykarda ko jma karain ، jesay alyktrank haylth rykardaza (EHRS) ، mydaykl charts ،awr dayta ka dawy krta haay۔as aadad wa shmar main mryzuwn kay aabadyaty aadad wa shmar ، taby tarykh ، tshkhysa ، alaj ، aur ntaij 12 kay baray main malwmat shaml hawskty hayn۔ aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha kryn: taby alaj aur ntaij main nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye dayta tjzayha ki tknyk ka astamal kryn۔as main alaj aur ntaij kay mabyn artbata ki nshandhay karnay kay liye shmaryaty tjzayha ka astamal ، ya mryzuwn kay ntaij 32 kay liye pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ki shnakht kay liye mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal shaml hawskta haay۔ bhatryn tarykwn ki nshandhay kryn: aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay par mbny taby alaj aur ntaij kay bhatryn tarykwn ki nshandhay kryn۔as main bhatr ntaij sy wabstha alaj ki nshandhay karna ، ya mryzuwn ki aabady ki nshandhay karna shaml hawsktay hain jo naksa ntaij 4 kay liye zayada khtarha hayn۔as main alaj kay prwtwkwl main tbdylyan ، mryzuwn ki talym aur mwasalat main tbdyly ، ya fraham knndha ki trbyt aur talym main tbdyly shaml hawskty hay ۔54۔ manytr kay ntaij: laghw tbdylywn ki tasayr ka andazaha karnay kay liye wkt kay sath ntaij ki nghrany kryn۔as main mryzuwn kay ntaij sy bakhbr rhana ، mryzuwn ki atamynan ki pymaish karna ، aur fraham knndha ki nghrany main niay alaj kay prwtwkwls 3 par aml karna shaml hawskta haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh mryzuwn ki sahat kay rykarda kay aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha karna aur taby alaj aur ntaij main nmwnwn ki nshandhay karna pychydha hawskta hay aur aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty hay aur is ki zurwrt hawskty haay۔mshyn lrnngh۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad dayta zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main maly lyn dyn ka dayta hawta haay۔nyt wrk tjzayha ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey aap jaly nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: maly lyn dyn kay aadad wa shmar main nyt wrk tjzayha ki tknyk ka astamal karty hoey jaly nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: maly lyn dyn kay aadad wa shmar ko jma kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy maly lyn dyn ka dayta aktha karain ، jesay tranzaykshn laghza ، kstmr prwfailza aur rsydyn۔as aadad wa shmar main lyn dyn ki rkm ، mkam ، wkt ، aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks 1 kay baray main malwmat shaml hawskty hayn۔ nyt wrk tjzayha ka mzaaharha: maly lyn dyn kay aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye nyt wrk tjzayha ki tknyk ka astamal kryn۔as main hasty lnk tjzayha aur ghraf alghwrthm shaml hawsktay hain jesay rastha tlash karna ya mrkzayt kay akdamat۔yha tarykay saarf ki staha kay awsaaf kay alawha talkat ki malwmat ko brwiay kar latay hoey dhwkha dhay kay tjzayat main mdd krsktay hayn۔ mshkwk nmwnwn ki nshandhay kryn: maly lyn dyn kay aadad wa shmar main mshkwk nmwnwn ki tlash karain ، jesay lyn dyn jo ghair mamwly awkat ya mkamat par paiay jatay hain ، ya lyn dyn main ghair mamwly mkdar main shaml hawta haay۔rkmyha nmwnay dhwkha dhay ki srghrmy ki nshandhay krsktay hayn۔as sy hastywn kay mabyn mshkwk talkat ki nshandhay karnay main mdd mil sakti hay ، jesay ayk hi shkhsa ya adarwn kay zaryaha mtadd akaؤnts astamal kyay jarhaay hain jo mtadd jaly lyn dyn main shaml hayn۔as main tranzaykshn manytrngh prwtwkwl main tbdylyan ، kstmr ki talym aur mwasalat main tbdyly ، ya fraham knndha ki trbyt aur talym 45 main tbdyly shaml hawskty haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh maly lyn dyn kay aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha karna aur jaly nmwnwn ki nshandhay karna pychydha hawskta hay aur aadad wa shmar kay tjzayha aur nyt wrk main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔tjzayha.mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad dayta zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main mlazamt kay drkhwast dhandghan ka dayta hawta haay۔aap kis tarah un awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ga jo bhrty ki hakmt amlywn ko bhatr bnanay kay liye mlazamt ki kamyab jghhawn main maawn hayn؟
Answer: mlazamt kay drkhwast dhandghan kay aadad wa shmar ka astamal karty hoey mlazamt ki kamyab tkrrywn main shrakt karnay waly awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay kay liye ، aur bhrty ki hakmt amlywn ko bhatr bnaiyn ، un akdamat par aml kryn: mlazamt kay drkhwast dhandghan ko jma kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy mlazamt kay drkhwast dhandghan ka dayta aktha karain ، jesay dwbarha shrwa ، mlazamt ki drkhwastyn ، aur amydwar prwfailza۔as aadad wa shmar main amydwar ki talym ، kam kay tjrbay ، mhaart aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks 1 kay baray main malwmat shaml hawskty hayn۔ amydwarwn kay aadad wa shmar ko tjzayha kryn: mlazamt kay drkhwast dhandghan kay aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye dayta tjzayha ki tknyk ka astamal kryn۔as main amydwarwn ki khsawsayat aur mlazamt ki kamyab jghhawn kay mabyn artbata ki nshandhay karnay kay liye shmaryaty tjzayha ka astamal ، ya mlazamt ki jghha ki kamyaby kay liye pysh ghwiy karnay waly madalza ki nshandhay karnay kay liye mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal shaml hawskta haay۔ kamyab amydwar ki khsawsayat ki nshandhay kryn: aysy khsawsayat ki tlash karain jo kamyab mlazamt ki jghhawn main aam hayn۔as main talym ki staha ، kam ka tjrbha ، mhaart aur dyghr mtalkha pymaish shaml hawskty haay۔an safat ki nshandhay karnay sy un amydwarwn par twjha mrkwza krkay bhrty ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti hay jo un awsaaf kay malk hayn۔as main aysy zaban ka astamal shaml hawskta hay jo mkhsawsa mhaart ya tjrbay waly amydwarwn ko apyl krta hay ، ya jab 5 kay liye sab sy aham un safat ko ajaghr krta haay۔ aljhn main tbdylyan: aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay sy haasal krdha bsayrt ki bnyad par bhrty ki hakmt amly main tbdylywn ko nafza kryn۔as main mlazamt ki pwstngh main tbdylyan ، amydwarwn ki askrynngh kay aml main tbdyly ، ya antrwyw swalat 64 main tbdylyan shaml hawskty hayn۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh mlazamt kay drkhwast dhandghan kay aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha karna aur mlazamt ki kamyab jghhawn main aham krdar ada karnay waly awaml ki nshandhay karna pychydha hawskta hay aur aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay main mhaart ki zurwrt hawskty hay awrmshyn lrnngh۔mzayd braan ، yeh zurwry hay keh kabl aatmad aadad wa shmar kay zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karain takha drst ntaij ko ykyny bnaya jaskay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main swshl mydaya par asar andaza hawta haay۔aap un kay tarykhy aadad wa shmar ki bnyad par asar wa rswkh ki karkrdghy ki pymaish ka tjzayha aur pysh ghwiy kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: un kay tarykhy aadad wa shmar ki bnyad par asar wa rswkh ki karkrdghy ki pymaish ka tjzayha aur pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: anflwynsr dayta aktha kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy asar wa rswkh ka dayta aktha karain ، jesay swshl mydaya prwfailza ، asar anghyza markytngh kay plyt farmza ، aur tjzayat kay awzaar۔as aadad wa shmar main asar wa rswkh ki rsai ، tasarat ، mshghwlyt ، samayn ki nmw ، aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks 12 kay baray main malwmat shaml hawskty hayn۔ asar wa rswkh kay aadad wa shmar ko tjzayha karnay waly aadad wa shmar: asar wa rswkh kay aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye dayta tjzayha ki tknyk ka astamal kryn۔as main asar wa rswkh ki khsawsayat aur karkrdghy ki pymaish kay mabyn artbata ki nshandhay karnay kay liye shmaryaty tjzayha ka astamal ، ya asar andaza hony waly karkrdghy 34 kay liye pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ki shnakht kay liye mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal shaml hawskta haay۔ klydy mytrks ki nshandhay kryn: klydy pymaish ki nshandhay karain jo asar wa rswkh ki karkrdghy ki pysh ghwiy kay liye aham hayn۔an main swshl mydaya 14 sy rsai ، tasarat ، mshghwlyt ، samayn ki nmw ، branda ka tzakrha ، aur tryfk shaml hawskta haay۔ pysh ghwiy ki karkrdghy: asar wa rswkh ki karkrdghy ki pysh ghwiy kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay sy haasal krdha bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔tarykhy dayta 3 par mbny mstkbl ki karkrdghy ki pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal krkay yeh kya jaskta haay۔ asar andaza karnay waly antkhab ko bhatr bnaiyn: asar wa rswkh kay antkhab ko bhatr bnanay kay liye dayta tjzayha sy haasal ki hogi bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main un asar wa rswkh ka antkhab karna shaml hawskta hay jn ki shnakht ki hogi klydy mytrks main aaly karkrdghy ki tarykh hay ، ya pysh ghwiy karnay waly madalza 56 par mbny mstkbl ki karkrdghy ka zayada amkan rkhnay waly asar wa rswkh ka antkhab krna۔awr dayta tjzayha aur mshyn lrnngh main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad dayta zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr ki shkayt ka dayta hawta haay۔msanwaat ya khdmat main bhatry ko trjyha denay kay l you aap aam drd kay nkat ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: saarfyn ki shkayt kay aadad wa shmar main aam drd kay nkat ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay aur msanwa ya khdmat main bhatry ko trjyha denay kay l these ، un akdamat par aml kryn: kstmr ki shkayt ka dayta aktha kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy saarfyn ki shkayt ka dayta aktha karain ، jesay kstmr spwrt bat chyt ، swshl mydaya aur srway۔as aadad wa shmar main shkayt ki nwayt ، is main shaml msanwa ya khdmt ، aur saarf kay tjrbay ki nwayt kay baray main malwmat shaml hawskty hayn۔ aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha kryn: saarfyn ki shkayt kay aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye dayta tjzayha ki tknyk ka astamal kryn۔as main aam drd kay nkat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay ka astamal karna ya ghahak ki shkayat kay liye pysh ghwiy karnay waly madalza ki nshandhay karnay kay liye mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal karna shaml hawskta haay۔trsyl kay awkatan drd kay nkat ki nshandhay karnay sy msanwaat ya khdmat ki bhatry ko trjyha denay main mdd mil sakti haay۔as main msanwaat kay dayzaain main tbdylyan ، kstmr srws kay aml main tbdyly ، ya trsyl kay tarykwn main tbdyly shaml hawskty haay۔as main saarfyn ki atamynan ka sragh lghana ، saarfyn ki wfadary ki pymaish karna ، aur saarfyn ki shkayat ki nghrany shaml hawskty haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh saarfyn ki shkayt kay aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha karna aur drd kay aam mkamat ki nshandhay karna pychydha hawskta hay aur is main dayta tjzayha aur mshyn sykhnay main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad dayta zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main aan lain prwdakt kay jaizaay hawtay hayn۔msanwaat ki trky ki rhanmaiy kay l you aap kis tarah baasar msanwaat ki khsawsayat aur jzabat ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ghay؟
Answer: aan lain msanwaat kay jaizawn main sab sy zayada baasar msanwaat ki khsawsayat aur jzabat ka tjzayha aur un ki nshandhay karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: aan lain msanwaat ka jaizaha lyn dayta aktha kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy aan lain prwdakt ka jaizaha lenay kay aadad wa shmar ko jma karain ، jesay ay kamrs wyb sait ، swshl mydaya ، aur jaizaha plyt farmza۔as aadad wa shmar main msanwa ، jaizaha lenay waly ، aur jaizaha 12 main azahaar krdha jzabat kay baray main malwmat shaml hawskty hayn۔ prfarmns jzabat ka tjzayha: aan lain msanwaat kay jaizawn main azahaar krdha jzabat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye jzabat kay tjzayha ki tknyk ka astamal kryn۔as main kdrty zaban prwsysngh (ayn ayl py) ya mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal msabt ، mnfy ، ya ghair janbdar jzabat 13 ki nshandhay karnay kay liye shaml hawskta haay۔ baasar msanwaat ki khsawsayat ki nshandhay kryn: aan lain msanwaat kay jaizawn main aam mwzuwaat ya anwanat ki tlash kryn۔as sy msanwaat ki sab sy zayada baasar khsawsayat ya un phalwؤn ki nshandhay karnay main mdd mil sakti hay jn ka jaizaha lenay main ksart sy zakr kya jata haay۔yha anwan madalngh ya klydy lfza nkalnay ki tknyk 45 ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔ msanwaat ki khsawsayt kay zaryaha jzabat ko tjzayha kryn: msanwaat ki khsawsayt kay zaryaha aan lain msanwaat kay jaizawn main azahaar krdha jzabat ka tjzayha kryn۔as sy yeh shnakht karnay main mdd mil sakti hay keh kon sy msanwaat ki khsawsayat aksar msabt ya mnfy jzabat sy wabstha hawty hayn۔yha phalw par mbny jzabat tjzayha ki tknyk 6 ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔ msanwaat ki bhatry ko bhatr bnaiyn: msanwaat ki bhatry ko trjyha denay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay sy haasal krdha bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main msanwaat ki khsawsayat main tbdyly lana shaml hawskta hay jo aksar mnfy jzabat sy wabstha hawtay hain ، ya msanwaat ki khsawsayat main bhatry lana jn ka aksar msabt jaizaay main zakr kya jata haay۔pychydha aur aadad wa shmar kay tjzayha aur mshyn lrnngh main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad dayta zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko ay kamrs sylza dayta par mushtamil ayk daytasyt diya jata haay۔anwyntry mynjmnt ko bhatr bnanay kay l you aap mwsmy talb kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: ay kamrs sylza kay aadad wa shmar main mwsmy talb kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur un ki nshandhay karnay kay liye anwyntry mynjmnt ko bhatr bnanay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: ay kamrs sylza dayta aktha kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy ay kamrs sylza dayta aktha karain ، jesay tranzaykshn laghza ، kstmr prwfailza aur rsydyn۔as aadad wa shmar main msanwa kay baray main malwmat ، khrydary kay wkt ، aur kstmr kay mkam 12 kay baray main malwmat shaml hawskty hayn۔ dayta ka tjzayha kryn: ay kamrs sylza dayta main nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye dayta tjzayha ki tknyk ka astamal kryn۔as main mwsmy talb kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay ka astamal karna ya frwkht ki pyshn ghwiy kay liye pysh ghwiy karnay waly madalza ki nshandhay karnay kay liye mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal shaml hawskta haay۔mkhsawsa wakaat kay dwran۔an nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay sy yeh ykyny bnatay hoey anwyntry kay antzaam ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti haay۔yha tarykhy frwkht kay aadad wa shmar ، markyt kay rjhaanat ، aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks 544 ka astamal karty hoey kya jaskta haay۔ anwyntry mynjmnt ko bhatr bnaiyn: anwyntry mynjmnt ko bhatr bnanay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay aur mtaalbha ki pysh ghwiy sy haasal krdha bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main mwsmy talb kay nmwnwn par mbny anwyntry ki staha ko aydajst karna ، chwty kay mwsmwn sy pehlay mkbwl msanwaat par zakhyrha karna ، aur sst harkt pzayr msanwaat kay liye anwyntry ki staha ko kam karna shaml hawskta haay۔pychydha aur aadad wa shmar kay tjzayha aur mshyn lrnngh main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad dayta zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko tryfk synsr dayta par mushtamil daytasyt diya jata haay۔nkl wa haml kay rastwn aur nzaam alawkat ko bhatr bnanay kay l you aap tryfk ki bhyra kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: tryfk synsr kay aadad wa shmar main tryfk ki bhyra kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay kay liye nkl wa haml kay rastwn aur nzaam alawkat ko bhatr bnanay kay l these ، un akdamat par aml kryn: tryfk synsr dayta aktha kryn: tryfk synsr kay aadad wa shmar ko mkhtlf zaraia sy jma karain ، jesay tryfk kymray ، jy py ays daywaisza ، aur tryfk synsr 1۔ dayta tjzayha kryn۔ dayta tjzayha kryn۔: tryfk synsr kay aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye dayta tjzayha ki tknyk ka astamal kryn۔as main bhyra kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay ka astamal karna ya tryfk flw 23 kay liye pysh ghwiy karnay waly madalza ki nshandhay karnay kay liye mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal karna shaml hawskta haay۔ bhyra kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay kryn: tryfk synsr kay aadad wa shmar main bhyra kay nmwnwn ki tlash karain ، jesay tryfk kay mstkl tawr par sst waly alakwn main ya aksar tryfk jam waly alakwn myn۔an nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay sy nkl wa haml kay rastwn aur nzaam alawkat ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti hay js sy hajwm waly alakwn sy bcha jaskta hay ya tryfk taim 12 sy bchnay kay liye nzaam alawkat ko aydajst kya jaskta haay۔as main tryfk kay awkat sy bchnay kay liye nkl wa haml kay nzaam alawkat ko aydajst karna ، ghnjan alakwn sy bchnay kay liye nkl wa haml kay rastwn ko bhatr bnana ، ya tryfk kay bhaaؤ ko bhatr bnanay kay liye tryfk mynjmnt ki hakmt amlywn ko nafza karna shaml hawskta haay۔dayta tjzayha aur mshyn lrnngh main mhaart۔mzayd braan ، yeh zurwry hay keh kabl aatmad aadad wa shmar kay zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karain takha drst ntaij ko ykyny bnaya jaskay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr braؤzangh ka dayta hawta haay۔saarf ki trjyhaat aur tarza aml ki bnyad par aap wyb sait ki sfarshat ka tjzayha aur zaaty nwayt ka tjzayha karain ghay؟

Answer: talymy prwghramwn ko bhatr bnanay kay l student talbaa ki karkrdghy kay aadad wa shmar ka astamal karty hoey talymy kamyaby main maawn un awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: talbaa ki karkrdghy ka dayta aktha kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy talbaa ki karkrdghy ka dayta aktha karain ، jesay talbaa kay rykarda ، mayary tyst askwr ، aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks 1234۔aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha kryn: talbha ki karkrdghy kay aadad wa shmar main nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye dayta tjzayha ki tknyk ka astamal kryn۔as main aadadwshmar kay tjzayay ka astamal shaml hawskta hay jo mshtrkha awaml ki nshandhay karain jo talymy kamyaby main shrakt karty hain ya talbaa ki karkrdghy 125 kay liye pysh ghwiy karnay waly madalza ki nshandhay karnay kay liye mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm astamal karty hayn۔ awaml ki nshandhay karain jo talymy kamyaby main maawn hayn: aysay awaml ki tlash karain jo talbaa ki karkrdghy kay aadad wa shmar main talymy kamyaby main shrakt karty hain ، is tarhajysa keh haazury ، shrkt ، drjat aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks۔an awaml ki nshandhay karnay sy un alakwn par twjha mrkwza krkay talymy prwghramwn ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti hay jn ka talbaa ki karkrdghy 123 par sab sy zayada asar prata haay۔ talymy prwghramwn ko frwgh dyn: talymy prwghramwn ko bhatr bnanay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay sy haasal ki hogi bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main kmzawry kay shabwn ko hal karnay kay liye targhtda mdakhltwn ko nafza karna ، talbaa ki zurwryat ko bhatr tarykay sy pora karnay kay liye tdrysy tarykwn ko aydajst karna ، ya talbaa ki kamyaby kay liye azuafy wsail ki frahamy shaml hawskty haay۔pychydha aur aadad wa shmar kay tjzayha aur mshyn lrnngh main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، yeh zurwry hay keh kabl aatmad aadad wa shmar kay zaraia aur tarykwn ko astamal karain takha drst ntaij ko ykyny bnaya jaskay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main krydat karda tranzaykshn dayta hawta haay۔aap bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay waly alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey jaly nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: krydat karda tranzaykshn dayta main bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay waly alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey dhwkha dhay kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur un ki nshandhay karnay kay liye ، un mrahal par aml kryn: krydat karda tranzaykshn dayta aktha kryn: krydat karda kmpnywn ، maly adarwn ، jesay krydat karda kmpnywn ، malyaty adarwn sy krydat karda tranzaykshn ka dayta aktha kryn۔awr kstmr prwfailza۔as pysh ghwiy karnay waly madalza ki nshandhay karnay kay liye mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal karna shaml hawskta haay۔ jaly nmwnwn ki nshandhay kryn: krydat karda kay lyn dyn kay aadad wa shmar main dhwkha dhay kay nmwnwn ki tlash karain ، jesay ghair mamwly awkat ya mkamat par paiay jatay hain ، lyn dyn ، lyn dyn main hawta haay۔jw mamwl sy kahain zayada braay hain ، ya lyn dyn jo saarf ki mamwl kay akhrajat ki mamwl ki aadat sy bahar hawta haay۔an nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay sy jaly lyn dyn ko kam krkay mhasawl aur wsail ki mkhtsa ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti haay۔yha mshyn lrnngh mkhtsa ko bhatr bnanay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay aur jaly lyn dyn ki pysh ghwiy sy haasal ki hogi bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main dhwkha dhay kay lyn dyn ki bhatr shnakht kay liye dhwkha dhay ka ptha lghanay waly alghwrthm ko aydajst karna ، dhwkha dhay sy mtalk lyn dyn ki mwjwdghy ko kam karnay kay liye dhwkha dhay sy bchaؤ ki hakmt amlywn ko nafza karna ، ya dhwkha dhay 123 sy saarfyn ko karnay kay liye tym ki harkyat ko aydajst karna ، ya aaly karkrdghy ka mzaaharha karnay wali tymwn ki mdd kay liye azuafy wsail ki frahamy shaml hawskty haay۔karkrdghy ka mzaaharha karnay wali tymyn Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main swshl mydaya par asar andaza hawta haay۔aap mnghny mytrks par mbny asar wa rswkh kay taawn kay liye zayada sy zayada wkt ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: swshl mydaya par mushtamil dayta par mushtamil daytasyt kay sath mshghwlyt mytrks par mbny asar wa rswkh kay taawn kay liye zayada sy zayada wkt ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: swshl mydaya par asar andaza karnay waly dayta ko jma kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy swshl mydaya anflwynsr dayta aktha karain ، jesay swshl mydaya plyt farm ، anflwiynsr markytnghplyt farm ، aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks 123456۔ aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha: asar wa rswkh sy wabstha mshghwlyt ki pymaish ki nshandhay karnay kay liye dayta tjzayha ki tknyk ka astamal kryn۔as main mshtrkha awaml ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay ka astamal shaml hawskta hay jo mshghwlyt main hasaha daaltay hain ya mshghwlyt kay liye pysh ghwiy karnay waly madalza ki nshandhay karnay kay liye mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal karty hayn۔ zayada sy zayada wkt ki nshandhay kryn: asar anghyza taawn sy wabstha mnghny mytrks main nmwnwn ki tlash karain ، jesay haftay ka dn ، wkt ، wkt ، wkt ، wkt ، wkt ، wktdn ka ، ya pwsts ki tadd۔an nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay sy zayada sy zayada mnghny 2345 kay liye zayada sy zayada wkt par twjha mrkwza krkay asar wa rswkh kay taawn ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti haay۔ anflwiynsr bahamy taawn ki hakmt amlywn ko frwgh dyn: asar wa rswkh ko bhatr bnanay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay sy haasal ki hogi bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main samayn ki zurwryat ko bhatr tarykay sy pora karnay kay liye taawn kay wkt ko aydajst karna ، bahamy taawn kay mwaka kay sath mkhsawsa asar wa rswkh ko nshanha bnana ، ya mshghwlyt mytrk pytrn 2345 par mbny taawn ki palysywn ko aydajst karna shaml hawskta haay۔pychydha aur aadad wa shmar kay tjzayha aur asar anghyza markytngh main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، yeh zurwry hay keh kabl aatmad aadad wa shmar kay zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karain takha drst ntaij ko ykyny bnaya jaskay۔
