asar daaltay hayn۔ markytngh aur aaؤt rych ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnaiyn: markytngh aur aaؤt rych hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay kay liye dayta tjzayha sy haasal ki hogi bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main asar wa rswkh aur mshghwlyt kay nmwnwn par mbny markytngh ki mhamat kay sath mkhsawsa saarfyn ko nshanha bnana ، un saarfyn ki zurwryat ko bhatr tarykay sy pora karnay kay liye markytngh kay pyghamat ko aydajst karna ، ya saarf kay asar wa rswkh aur mshghwlyt kay tjzayay par mbny markytngh ki palysywn ko aydajst karna shaml haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh swshl mydaya dayta ka tjzayha krna۔awr nyt wrk tjzayha aur ghraf alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey saarf kay asar wa rswkh aur mshghwlyt kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karna pychydha hawskta hay aur isy dayta tjzayha aur swshl mydaya markytngh main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad aadad wa shmar kay zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: "aap ko ayk daytasyt diya gaya hay js main kstmr ki khrydary ka dayta mwjwd haay۔ aap aar ayf aym (rysnsy ، tadd ، manytry) tjzayha aur klstrngh tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey anthaaiy mnafa bkhsh saarfyn kay tabkat ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟"
Answer: aar ayf aym (ryssy ، frykwynsy ، manytry) tjzayha aur klstrngh tknyk ka astamal karty hoey saarfyn kay khrydary kay aadad wa shmar par mushtamil dayta kay sath tjzayha aur klstrngh tknyk ka astamal karty hoey anthaaiy mnafa bkhsh saarfyn kay tabkat ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: kstmr ki khrydary ka dayta aktha kryn: jesay mkhtlf zaraia sy kstmr ki khrydary ka dayta aktha kryn۔-kamrs plyt farm ، pwaint aaf syl sstm ، aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks۔ prfarm dayta tjzayha: kstmr ki khrydary kay aadad wa shmar main anthaaiy mnafa bkhsh saarfyn kay tabkat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye aar ayf aym tjzayha aur klstrngh tknyk ka astamal kryn۔as main alghwrthm ka astamal shaml hawskta hay jesay K-Means klstrngh ya drjha bndy kay klstrngh ko isi tarah kay saarfyn ko ayk sath ghrwp karnay aur aam khrydary kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karna shaml haay۔ sab sy zayada mnafa bkhsh kstmr tabkat ki nshandhay kryn: kstmr ki khrydary kay aadad wa shmar main anthaaiy mnafa bkhsh kstmr tabkat ki tlash karain ، jesay aaly saarfynkhrydary ki frykwinsy ، aaly khrydary ki kymt ، ya haalyha khrydary۔an tabkat ki nshandhay karnay sy un alakwn par twjha mrkwza krkay markytngh aur frwkht ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti hay jn ka mhasawl par sab sy zayada asar prata haay۔ markytngh aur frwkht ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnaiyn: markytngh aur frwkht ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay kay liye dayta tjzayha sy haasal ki hogi bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main khrydary kay pytrn kay tjzayay par mbny un ghahak tabkat ki zurwryat ko bhatr tawr par pora karnay kay liye markytngh kay pyghamat ko aydajst karna ، mnafa kay nmwnwn par mbny markytngh ki mhamat kay sath mkhsawsa kstmr tabkat ko nshanha bnana ، ya mnafa bkhsh tjzayha par mbny markytngh ki palysywn ko aydajst karna shaml haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh kstmr ka tjzayha karna yeh hay keh kstmr ka tjzayha krnaaadad wa shmar ki khrydary aur aar ayf aym tjzayha aur klstrngh tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey saarfyn kay anthaaiy mnafa bkhsh tabkat ki nshandhay karna pychydha hawskta hay aur is main dayta tjzayha aur markytngh main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad aadad wa shmar kay zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr klyk astrym dayta hawta haay۔aap rastha tjzayha aur tsaw .r ki tknyk ka astamal karty hoey saarf kay anthaaiy mwsar tbadlwn kay fnnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: kstmr kay klk astrym dayta par mushtamil daytasyt kay sath rastay kay tjzayay aur tsaw .r ki tknyk ka astamal karty hoey saarf kay tbadlwn kay sab sy mwsar fnnwn ka tjzayha aur un ki nshandhay karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: kstmr kay klk astrym dayta ko jma kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy kstmr kay klk astrym dayta ko jma karain ، jesay swshl mydaya plyt farm ، wyb skrypngh ،awr dyghr mtalkha mytrks 12۔ aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha kryn: kstmr kay klk astrym dayta main saarf kay mؤsar mؤsar trien fynlza ki nshandhay karnay kay liye rastha tjzayha aur tsaw .r ki tknyk ka astamal kryn۔as main alghwrthm jesay ghraf thywry ka astamal shaml hawskta hay jo aam rastwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye ghraf thywry ka astamal karty hayn۔aaly trien tbadlwn ki shrha ya rastwn par jo sab sy zayada aamdny ka baasa bntay hayn۔an fnlza ki nshandhay karnay sy un alakwn par twjha mrkwza krkay markytngh aur frwkht ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti hay jn ka tbadlwn ki shrhawn aur mhasawlat par sab sy zayada asar prata hay ۔34. markytngh aur frwkht ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnaiyn: markytngh aur frwkht ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay kay liye dayta tjzayha sy haasal krdha bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main tbadlwn kay fnl tjzayha ki bnyad par saarfyn ki zurwryat ko bhatr tawr par pora karnay kay liye markytngh kay pyghamat ko aydajst karna ، tbadlwn kay fnl nmwnwn par mbny markytngh ki mhamat kay sath mkhsawsa saarf tabkat ko nshanha bnana ، ya tbadlwn kay fnl tjzayha par mbny markytngh ki palysywn ko aydajst karna shaml haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh kstmr ka tjzayha karna haay۔klyk astrym dayta aur raha kay tjzayha aur tsaw .r ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey saarf kay anthaaiy mwsar tbadlwn kay fnlza ki nshandhay karna pychydha hawskta hay aur is kay liye dayta tjzayha aur markytngh main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad dayta zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main aan lain mlazamt pwstngh ka dayta hawta haay۔aap tykst mainngh aur trynda tjzayha ka astamal karty hoey mlazamt ki sab sy zayada mhaart aur mlazamt kay bazaar kay rjhaanat ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: aan lain jab pwstngh dayta par mushtamil daytasyt kay sath tykst mainngh aur trynda tjzayha ka astamal karty hoey sab sy zayada talb mlazamt ki mhaart aur mlazamt kay bazaar kay rjhaanat ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: aan lain mlazamt pwstngh dayta aktha kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy aan lain mlazamt pwst karnay ka dayta aktha karain ، is tarhamlazamt kay bwrda ، kmpny ki wyb saityn ، aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks 1234 ki haysayt say۔ aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha kryn: aan lain mlazamt ki pwstngh dayta main mlazamt ki sab sy zayada mhaart aur mlazamt kay bazaar kay rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye tykst mainngh aur trynda tjzayha ka astamal kryn۔as main mlazamt ki markyt 134 main mlazamt ki aam mhaart aur rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye tap madalngh ya jzabat kay tjzayha jesay alghwrthm ka astamal shaml hawskta haay۔ mlazamt ki sab sy zayada mhaart aur mlazamt kay bazaar kay rjhaanat ki nshandhay kryn: mlazamt ki sab sy zayada mhaart aur mlazamt ki tlash kryn۔aan lain mlazamt main markyt kay rjhaanat ، jesay dayta tjzayha ، msanway zahaant ، ya braay dayta sy mtalk mhaart۔an mhaartwn aur rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay sy mlazamt kay mtlashywn aur aajrwn ko mlazamt ki markyt kay tazaha trien mtaalbat kay mtaabk tazaha trien rhanay main mdd mil sakti hay aur is kay mtaabk un ki hakmt amly ko aydajst kya jaskta haay۔ mlazamt ki tlash aur khdmat haasal karnay ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnaiyn: mlazamt ki tlash aur mlazamt ko bhatr bnanay kay liye dayta tjzayha sy haasal krdha bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔hakmt amlyas main mlazamt ki pwstngh ya mlazamt ki tlash kay swalat kay sath mlazamt ki mkhsawsa salahaytwn aur rjhaanat ko nshanha bnana ، mlazamt ki markyt ki zurwryat ko bhatr tarykay sy pora karnay kay liye mlazamt ki tfsayl ko aydajst karna ، ya mlazamt ki mnday kay rjhaan kay tjzayha 34 par mbny mlazamt ki palysyan aydajst karna shaml hawskta haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh aan lain nwkry ka tjzayha karna yeh hay keh aan lain nwkry ka tjzayha krna۔dayta pwst karna aur tykst mainngh aur trynda tjzayha ka astamal karty hoey mlazamt ki sab sy zayada mhaart aur mlazamt kay bazaar kay rjhaanat ki nshandhay karna pychydha hawskta hay aur is kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay aur ansany wsail main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad aadad wa shmar kay zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr ki msanwaat ki drjha bndy hawty haay۔aap khsawsayt ki ahamyt ki tknyk aur pysh ghwiy karnay wali madalngh ka astamal karty hoey msanwaat ki drjha bndy par asar andaza hony waly anthaaiy baasar awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: kstmr prwdakt ki drjha bndy par mushtamil daytasyt kay sath khsawsayt ki ahamyt ki tknyk aur pysh ghwiy karnay wali madalngh ka astamal karty hoey msanwaat ki drjha bndy par asar andaza hony waly anthaaiy baasar awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: kstmr prwdakt ki drjha bndy ka dayta aktha kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy kstmr prwdakt ki drjha bndy ka dayta aktha karain ، jesay ay-kamrs plyt farm ، kstmr fyda byk farm ، aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks۔ aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha: kstmr ki msanwaat ki drjha bndy kay aadad wa shmar main msanwaat ki drjha bndy par asar andaza hony waly anthaaiy baasar awaml ki nshandhay karnay kay liye khsawsayt ki ahamyt ki tknyk aur pysh ghwiy karnay wali madalngh ka astamal kryn۔as main alghwrthm jesay lkyry rjat ya fysalha kn drkhtwn ka astamal shaml hawskta hay jo msanwaat ki drjha bndy par asar andaza hony wali sab sy aham khsawsayat ki nshandhay kryn۔ anthaaiy baasar awaml ki nshandhay kryn: kstmr prwdakt rytngh dayta main msanwaat ki drjha bndy par asar andaza hony waly anthaaiy baasar awaml ki tlash karain ، jesay msanwaat kay mayar ko mtasar kryn۔، kstmr srws ، ya kymtwn ka tayn۔an awaml ki nshandhay karnay sy un alakwn par twjha mrkwza krkay msanwaat ki trky aur markytngh ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti hay jo saarfyn ki atamynan aur wfadary 12 par sab sy zayada asar daaltay hayn۔ msanwaat ki trky aur markytngh ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnaiyn: msanwaat ki trky aur markytngh ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay sy haasal krdha bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main drjha bndy kay ansar kay tjzayha ki bnyad par kstmr ki zurwryat ko bhatr tarykay sy pora karnay kay liye msanwaat ki khsawsayat ko aydajst karna ، drjha bndy kay ansar kay nmwnwn par mbny markytngh ki mhamat kay sath mkhsawsa kstmr tabkat ko nshanha bnana ، ya drjha bndy kay ansar tjzayha 12 par mbny markytngh ki palysyan aydajst karna shaml haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh kstmr prwdakt ki drjha bndy ka tjzayha karna zurwry haayaadad wa shmar aur khsawsayt ki ahamyt ki tknyk aur pysh ghwiy karnay wali madalngh ka astamal karty hoey msanwaat ki drjha bndy par asar andaza hony waly anthaaiy baasar awaml ki nshandhay karna pychydha hawskta hay aur is kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayha aur markytngh main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad aadad wa shmar kay zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya gaya hay js main swshl mydaya dayta haay۔aap jzabat kay tjzayha aur wkt ki syryza kay tjzayay ka astamal karty hoey mkhsawsa wakaat ya mhamat kay doran saarf kay jzabat aur mshghwlyt kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: swshl mydaya dayta par mushtamil daytasyt kay sath jzabat kay tjzayha aur taim syryza kay tjzayha ka astamal karty hoey mkhsawsa wakaat ya mhamat kay doran saarf kay jzabat aur mshghwlyt kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: swshl mydaya dayta aktha kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy swshl mydaya dayta aktha karain ، jesay swshl mydaya dayta aktha kryn۔mydaya plyt farm ، wyb skrypngh ، aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks 12345۔ aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha: swshl mydaya dayta main mkhsawsa wakaat ya mhamat kay doran saarf kay jzabat aur mshghwlyt kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye jzabat kay tjzayha aur taim syryza kay tjzayay ka astamal kryn۔as main swshl mydaya dayta 645 main sab sy aam mwzuwaat aur rjhaanat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye tap madalngh ya mtalwbha alfaza ki twsya ki tknyk jesay alghwrthm ka astamal shaml hawskta haay۔ saarf kay jzabat aur mshghwlyt kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay kryn: saarf kay jzabat aur mshghwlyt kay nmwnwn ko tlash karain ya mkhsawsa wakaat ya mhamwn kay doran mshghwlyt kay nmwnwn ko tlash kryn۔swshl mydaya dayta ، jesay wkt kay sath sath jzabat ya mshghwlyt ki staha main tbdyly۔an nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay sy un alakwn par twjha mrkwza krkay markytngh aur aaؤt rych hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti hay jn ka sab sy zayada asar swshl mydaya ki mnghny 645 par hawta haay۔ markytngh aur aaؤt rych hakmt amly ko bhatr bnaiyn: markytngh aur aaؤt rych hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay sy haasal ki hogi bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main jzabat aur mshghwlyt kay nmwnwn kay tjzayay par mbny saarfyn ki zurwryat ko bhatr tawr par pora karnay kay liye markytngh kay pyghamat ko aydajst karna ، jzabat aur mshghwlyt kay nmwnwn kay tjzayha par mbny markytngh ki mhamat kay sath mkhsawsa saarf tabkat ko nshanha bnana ، ya jzabat aur mshghwlyt kay tjzayha 645 par mbny markytngh ki palysyan aydajst karna shaml hayn۔ yeh aham haay۔yha nwt karnay kay liye keh swshl mydaya dayta ka tjzayha karna aur jzabat kay tjzayha aur wkt ki syryza kay tjzayay ka astamal karty hoey mkhsawsa wakaat ya mhamat kay doran saarf kay jzabat aur mshghwlyt kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karna pychydha hawskta hay aur aadad wa shmar kay tjzayha aur markytngh main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad dayta zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main aan lain ashthaary dayta hawta haay۔aap A/B tystngh aur aadadwshmar kay tjzayay ka astamal karty hoey mham ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay aur antkhaby karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay aur antkhaby karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: aan lain ashthaary aadad wa shmar par mushtamil daytasyt kay sath A/B tystngh aur shmaryaty tjzayha ka astamal karty hoey A/B tystngh aur shmaryaty tjzayha ka astamal karty hoey mham ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay aur un ki nshandhay karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: aan lain ashthaary dayta aktha kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy aan lain ashthaary dayta aktha karain ، jesay ADplyt farmza ، wyb tjzayat ، aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks 12۔ aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha: A/B tystngh aur shmaryaty tjzayha ka astamal anthaaiy mؤsar AD ko nshanha bnanay ki hakmt amlywn ki nshandhay karnay aur aan lain ashthaary aadad wa shmar main mham ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liay۔as main mkhtlf ashthaary anasar ki janch karna shaml hawskta hay ، jesay ashthaar kapy ، tsaawyr ، aur mayar ko nshanha bnana ، is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye keh kon sy anasar bhatryn karkrdghy ka mzaaharha karty hayn۔ anthaaiy mwsar ashthaar ko nshanha bnanay ki hakmt amly ki nshandhay kryn: aan lain ashthaary aadad wa shmar main anthaaiy mwsar ashthaar ko nshanha bnanay ki hakmt amlywn ko tlash karain ، jysaymkhsawsa aabadyat ya mfadat ko nshanha bnana ، ya aap kay branda kay sath pehlay hi bat chyt karnay waly saarfyn tak phanchnay kay liye rytarjtngh ka astamal krna۔an hakmt amlywn ki nshandhay karnay sy ashthaary mhamat ko bhatr bnanay aur mham ki mjmway karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti haay۔as main A/B tystngh aur shmaryaty tjzayha ki bnyad par apnay hadf kay samayn ki zurwryat ko bhatr tawr par pora karnay kay liye AD ko nshanha bnanay kay mayar ko aydajst karna ، hakmt amly kay nmwnwn par mbny ashthaar ki mhamwn kay sath mkhsawsa saarf tabkat ko nshanha bnana ، ya hakmt amly tjzayha 126 par mbny ashthaar ki palysywn ko aydajst karna shaml haay۔yha nwt karna zurwry hay keh aan lain ashthaary aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha karna aur A/B tystngh aur shmaryaty tjzayha ka astamal karty hoey anthaaiy mwsar AD ko nshanha bnanay ki hakmt amlywn ki nshandhay karna aur mham ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnana pychydha hawskta hay aur is main dayta tjzayha aur markytngh main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، yeh zurwry hay keh kabl aatmad aadad wa shmar kay zaraia aur tarykwn ko astamal karain takha drst ntaij ko ykyny bnaya jaskay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kstmr daymwghrafk dayta hawta haay۔klstrngh alghwrthm aur daymwghrafk mtghyrat ka astamal karty hoey aap kstmr tksym aur hadf markytngh ki hakmt amly kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: kstmr daymwghrafk dayta par mushtamil daytasyt kay sath klstrngh alghwrthm aur daymwghrafk mtghyrat ka astamal karty hoey kstmr ki tksym aur hadf markytngh ki hakmt amly kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: kstmr daymwghrafk dayta ko jma kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy kstmr daymwghrafk dayta ko jma karain ، jesay kstmr ki raiay ، srway ، srway۔، aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks 123. prfarm dayta tjzayha: kstmr daymwghrafk dayta main kstmr ki tksym aur hadf markytngh ki hakmt amly kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay kay liye klstrngh alghwrthm aur daymwghrafk mtghyrat ka astamal kryn۔as main alghwrthm ka astamal shaml hawskta hay jesay K-Means klstrngh ya drjha bndy kay klstrngh jesay jesay saarfyn ko ayk sath ghrwp karain aur mshtrkha aabadyaty nmwnwn ki shnakht kryn۔، ya mkam۔an nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay sy un alakwn par twjha mrkwza krkay markytngh aur frwkht ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti hay jo saarfyn ki atamynan aur wfadary 1423 par sab sy zayada asar daaltay hayn۔ markytngh aur frwkht ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnaiyn: markytngh aur frwkht ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay sy haasal krdha bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main daymwghrafk pytrn tjzayha par mbny mkhsawsa kstmr tabkat ki zurwryat ko bhatr tawr par pora karnay kay liye markytngh kay pyghamat ko aydajst karna ، tabkha kay nmwnwn par mbny markytngh ki mhamat kay sath mkhsawsa kstmr tabkat ko nshanha bnana ، ya tabkha tjzayha 1423 par mbny markytngh ki palysyan aydajst karna shaml haay۔daymwghrafk dayta aur klstrngh alghwrthm aur daymwghrafk mtghyrat ka astamal karty hoey kstmr ki tksym aur hadf markytngh ki hakmt amly kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karna pychydha hawskta hay aur is kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayha aur markytngh main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad dayta zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main sahat ki dykh bhal ka dayta hawta haay۔aap ayswsy ayshn rwl kan kny aur pysh ghwiy karnay wali madalngh ka astamal karty hoey bymary kay sath mrzu kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ga aur bymary kay khtaray ko askwrngh madal tyar karain ghay؟
Answer: bymary kay bahamy mrzu kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur un ki nshandhay karnay aur sahat ki dykh bhal kay aadad wa shmar par mushtamil daytasyt kay sath ayswsy ayshn rwl kan kny aur pysh ghwiy karnay wali madalngh ka astamal karty hoey bymary kay khtaray kay askwrngh madal ko tyar karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: sahat ki dykh bhal kay aadad wa shmar ko jma kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy sahat ki dykh bhal kay aadad wa shmar ko jma karain ، jesay alyktrank sahat sayrykardaza ، klynykl dayta bys ، aur antzaamy sahat kay aadad wa shmar 123۔ aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha: bymary kay bahamy mrzu kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay aur sahat ki dykh bhal kay aadad wa shmar main bymary kay khtaray kay askwrngh madal ko tyar karnay kay liye ayswsy ayshn rwl mainngh aur pyshn ghwiy madalngh ka astamal kryn۔as main alghwrthm jesay fysalha kn drkhtwn ya lajstk rjat ka astamal un aham khsawsayat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye shaml hawskta hay jo bymary kay khtaray ko mtasar karty hayn۔kchh bymarywn ya khtaray kay awaml ky۔an nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay sy bymarywn ki rwk tham aur antzaamy hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti hay js main mryzuwn ki sahat 4523 par sab sy zayada asar prata haay۔ bymarywn sy bchaؤ aur antzaamy hakmt amly ko bhatr bnaiyn: bymarywn ki rwk tham aur antzaamy hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay sy haasal ki hogi bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main hum aahanghy kay nmwnwn kay tjzayay par mbny mryzuwn ki zurwryat ko bhatr tawr par pora karnay kay liye rwk tham aur antzaamy hakmt amlywn ko aydajst karna ، shryk mrbyty nmwnwn par mbny rwk tham aur antzaamy prwghramwn kay sath mryzuwn kay mkhsawsa tabkat ko nshanha bnana ، ya hum aahanghy kay tjzayha 4523 par mbny sahat ki dykh bhal ki palysywn ko aydajst karna shaml haay۔yha nwt karna zurwry hay keh sahat ki dykh bhal kay aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha karna aur bymary kay bahamy mrzu kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karna aur ayswsy ayshn rwl kan kny aur pysh ghwiy karnay wali madalngh ka astamal karty hoey bymary kay khtaray kay askwrngh madal ko tyar karna pychydha hawskta hay aur aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay aur sahat ki dykh bhal main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad dayta zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main asmart hawm sy synsr dayta hawta haay۔aap kis tarah twanaiy ki khpt kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht karain ga aur taim syryza tjzayha aur mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey twanaiy kay astamal ki pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ko kis tarah tyar karain ghay؟
Answer: twanaiy ki khpt kay nmwnwn ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay aur asmart hawm sy synsr dayta par mushtamil daytasyt kay sath taim syryza tjzayha aur mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey twanaiy kay astamal ki pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ko tyar karnay kay liye ، un akdamat par aml kryn: synsr dayta aktha kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy synsr dayta aktha karain ، jysayasmart hawm daywaisza ، anrjy mytrza ، aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks 1 kay tawr pr۔ aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha kryn: twanaiy kay astamal kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay aur synsr kay aadad wa shmar main twanaiy kay astamal ki pysh ghwiy karnay waly madal ko tyar karnay kay liye taim syryza tjzayha aur mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm astamal kryn۔as main tarykhy dayta 2341 par mbny twanaiy ki khpt ki pysh ghwiy karnay kay liye aryma ya ayl ays ty aym jesay alghwrthm ka astamal shaml hawskta haay۔ twanaiy ki khpt kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay kryn: synsr kay aadad wa shmar main twanaiy ki khpt kay nmwnwn ki tlash karain ، jesay mkhsawsa aalat kay liye chwty kay astamal kay awkat ya astamal kay nmwnay۔an nmwnwn ki nshandhay karnay sy twanaiy kay astamal ko bhatr bnanay aur twanaiy ki laght ko kam karnay main mdd mil sakti haay۔as main twanaiy kay astamal kay nmwnwn ko aydajst karna shaml hawskta hay takha twanaiy ki khpt kay pytrn tjzayha ki bnyad par ghhr ki zurwryat ko bhatr tawr par pora kya jaskay ، astamal kay nmwnha tjzayha par mbny twanaiy ki bcht kay akdamat kay sath mkhsawsa aalat ko nshanha bnana ، ya twanaiy ki khpt tjzayha 51 par mbny twanaiy ki palysywn ko aydajst karna shaml haay۔ yeh zurwry haay۔nwt karain keh synsr kay aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha karna aur twanaiy ki khpt kay nmwnwn ki nshandhay karna aur wkt ki syryza tjzayha aur mshyn lrnngh alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey twanaiy kay astamal ki pyshn ghwiy karnay waly madal ko tyar karna pychydha hawskta hay aur aadad wa shmar kay tjzayha aur twanaiy kay antzaam main mhaart ki zurwrt praskty haay۔mzayd braan ، drst ntaij ko ykyny bnanay kay liye kabl aatmad dayta zaraia aur tarykwn ka astamal karna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap ko ayk daytasyt diya jata hay js main kesi mwwy astrymngh srws kay liye kstmr kay jaizaay hawtay hayn۔aap jzabat kay tjzayha aur bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey mwwy ki drjha bndy aur sfarshat ko mtasar karnay waly anthaaiy baasar awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht kesay karain ghay؟
Answer: un sab sy zayada baasar awaml ka tjzayha aur shnakht karnay kay liye jo flm ki drjha bndy aur sfarshat par asar andaza karty hain jo kesi daytasyt kay sath jzabat kay tjzayha aur bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hain js main mwwy astrymngh srws kay liye kstmr kay jaizaay hawtay hain ، un akdamat par aml kryn: kstmr ka jaizaha lenay kay aadad wa shmar ko jma kryn: mkhtlf zaraia sy kstmr kay jaizaay kay aadad wa shmar ko jma karain ،jysay mwwy astrymngh plyt farmza ، kstmr fyda byk farm ، aur dyghr mtalkha mytrks 12345۔ aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha: kstmr kay jaizaay kay aadad wa shmar main mwwy ki drjha bndy aur sfarshat ko mtasar karnay waly anthaaiy baasar awaml ki nshandhay karnay kay liye jzabat kay tjzayha aur bahamy taawn sy mtalk fltrngh ki tknyk ka astamal kryn۔as main alghwrthm jesay mytrks fyktraizayshn ya mwad par mbny fltrngh jesay aham khsawsayat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye shaml hawsktay hain jo mwwy ki drjha bndy aur sfarshat ko mtasar karty hayn۔، jesay flmy sanf ، adakar ، ya plat۔an awaml ki nshandhay karnay sy un alakwn par twjha mrkwza krkay flm kay antkhab aur sfarsh ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay main mdd mil sakti hay jn ka sab sy zayada asar saarfyn kay atamynan aur msarwfyt 465 par hawta haay۔ mwwy kay antkhab aur sfarsh ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnaiyn: mwwy kay antkhab aur sfarshat ki hakmt amly ko bhatr bnanay kay liye aadad wa shmar kay tjzayay sy haasal krdha bsayrt ka astamal kryn۔as main fychr tjzayha par mbny saarfyn ki zurwryat ko bhatr tawr par pora karnay kay liye mwwy kay antkhab ko aydajst karna ، khsawsayt kay nmwnwn par mbny flm ki sfarshat kay sath mkhsawsa kstmr tabkat ko nshanha bnana ، ya fychr tjzayha 465 par mbny mwwy palysywn ko aydajst karna shaml haay۔ yeh nwt karna zurwry hay keh kstmr kay jaizaay kay aadad wa shmar ka tjzayha karna awrjzabat tjzayha aur bahamy taawn kay sath fltrngh ki tknykwn ka astamal karty hoey mwwy ki drjha bndy aur sfarshat ko mtasar karnay waly shmar kay zaraia aur tarykwn ko astamal karain takha drst ntaij ko ykyny bnaya jaskay۔

Answer: malyaty lyn dyn kay aadad wa shmar par mushtamil daytasyt kay sath nyt wrk tjzayha aur bay zuabtaghy ka ptha lghanay waly alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey mny landarngh aur jaly lyn dyn kay
